name: Flat in Monastiraki with unique view of Acropolis
description: A unique apartment in the city center of Athens, just 150 metres away from Monastiraki metro station. It has a breathtaking view of Acropolis from its private balcony.  It is located, close to all main attractions and connected to the airport via metro, bus and trains. There are many supermarkets, stores, restaurants in the area easily reached on foot. All health protocols are followed. Special cleaning measures are applied against Covid 19. Netflix Disney Plus are also available via a smart TV!
neighborhood_overview:
The flat is located at Monastiraki district in the historic centre of Athens. There are plenty of bars, restaurants, cafes, supermarket, stores with folklore items such as sandals, clothes, handmade, leather bags. Monastiraki is considered as the heart of local cuisine where you can taste original Greek food and buy fresh, traditional products. In addition, Monastiraki area is the best place to have a taste of Athens’ nightlife.
Psirri is also another interesting area close to the flat. All the food lovers and the fans of cocktails will find the most sophisticated bars and restaurants in Psirri. It is accessible within 5 minutes walk.
For holidaymakers who crave to combine historic visits and fun at the seaside, this flat is ideal since you have easy access to the Athenian beaches too . To get there by using the subway, you should get off at Syntagma metro station. Then, you will take the tram towards Asklipio Voulas and get off either at Edem station, or Alimos, or Paralia

name: D16 Athens cosy apt, 5' walk metro, 25' Acropolis
description:
Our cosy apartment is in a quiet and historic neighborhood in Athens (Ano Petralona). Come and enjoy our original lifestyle.

The apartment is located in a quiet street, by a green hill, 5min walk from Petralona Metro. You can also walk to Acropolis passing by the hill. You can reach Monastiraki, Thisio & Syntagma within 10'.

Most historic sights are within walking distance.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located next to one of the very few and still green hills in Athens; Dexamenis hill in Ano Petralona. Saying that, you will enjoy the trees and fresh air any time you walk out or hang out on the front balcony.

Petralona is one of the few neighborhoods that still is maintaining its authenticity of a traditional Athenian neighborhood.

In Petralona, you can immerse yourselves in the original Athenian lifestyle as it offers a wide option of places to eat, have a drink or even catch a movie in one of the oldest open air cinemas of Athens, Zephyrus (summer time). All local, friendly and cosy, and not tourist "traps".

Within walking distance you will find a very convenient 24hr supermarket, bakery, local taverns and pastry shop.

You can enjoy a fairly tranquil neighborhood which is in close proximity to the famous and crowded Athens sights, the many archaeological areas, but also to Athens nightlife.

name: Fully Renovated 2bdrm Apartment in Kolonaki area
description:
Newly renovated apartment in a neoclassical building in Kolonaki area, Athens.
The apartment lies on the 1st floor (not ground floor) of the building and is 74 sqm big.
The apartment has a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, a second bedroom, a second bathroom and a large living room with kitchen facilities. All rooms are air-conditioned.
It is 100 meters away from the Kolonaki square in the heart of Athens and just 7 min. away from Syntagma & Evangelismos Metro Stations.
NETFLIX available
neighborhood_overview:
Kolonaki is a wealthy and upmarket district. As one of Athens' leading shopping areas, it includes a number of high-end boutiques from young adult to casual fashion to prestigious haute couture from Greek and international designers. One of its main shopping streets, Voukourestiou Street, is now known for its jewelry.

Museums and galleries also abound in Kolonaki. The Benaki Museum, inside a preserved neoclassical manor house, and the Goulandris Museum of Cycladic Art and are two of the finest private collections in the country. Two smaller museums to be found in Kolonaki are the Museum of the History of Greek Costume and the Theater Museum, both highly specialized in their respective areas. A walk across the street from Vasilissis Sofias Avenue are the Byzantine Museum, and the War Museum of Athens.

There is a huge number of available options for nightlife, including bars, ouzeries and tavernas. Outdoor seating on pedestrian walks is typical, creating a lively at

neighborhood_overview:
Victoria Neighbourhood is one of the oldest in downtown Athens. It got its name from the homonym Square, in the heart of the neighborhood. The Square was named after Queen Victoria, in her honor, the year 1864. Victoria Square and the surrounding area is full of coffee shops, restaurants, and places serving fast food, which are usually full of students from nearby Universities and Private Schools.

From Victoria Metro Station you can take line 1 which connects the area with all of Athens, Piraeus (Direct connection to the Port) and the Airport (Line 3). There is one stop away from Metro line 2 (Acropolis) and two stops away from Metro line 3 (Monastiraki - Airport).

Within 5-10 minutes walk (depending on walking) are the National Archaeological Museum, Larissa Railway Station (Intercity and Suburban Network, Metro Station Larissa Station - metro line 2), and the KTEL of the Prefecture of Attica. The neighborhood is an area for your stay in Athens. Access to it is e
host_about:
I was born and raised in Athens. I studied Computer Engineering and Electronics at the University of Athens and I am an outgoing personality who likes to travel a lot. I’m a very friendly person and helpful with others, and in my free time I like to organize my next trips.

As a passionate traveler, but also as a Greek woman I have adopted the element of hospitality from an early age. I enjoy meeting pleasant people from all around the world. I like to help and serve them, making their accommodation more comfortable for as long as they stay in my country.

I know for sure all the needs that a simple traveler, a family or a group of friends may have and what I enjoy the most is to see their satisfaction when they leave Greece.

I have a small business (Mobile repair lab) right next to the apartment to rent. I will be very happy to meet you in person and serve you for as long as you stay in Athens.

Until then, “Bon voyage” and I wish to enjoy your stay in my apartment!

name: Minimalist studio in the heart of Athens
description: A minimalistic high quality studio apartment located on a quite spot in the center of Athens, in a walking distance from the Acropolis and famous areas such as Monastiraki, Agia Eirini, Psyrri, Kerameikos, Gazi and Plaka. it is ideal for guests that want to experience the real Athens, meet locals, visit the historic sites, the flea market and the numerous shops, restaurants, bars and coffee places, that are nearby.
neighborhood_overview: When exiting the building's main entrance, the visitor may choose either to take the Apostolou Pavlou Walk and pass through all the monuments around Acropolis leading to the temple of Parthenon and the vicinity of Plaka or walk in the famous flea market (Andianou street Ermou street) of Monastiraki and Psyrri. Either way all the above are connected through a circular pedestrian root starting and ending at the apartment through which a visitor may experience the culture of historical Athens.  Along the walk there are plenty of places to drink coffee under the sun and taste local and ethnic cuisines or even have cocktails in local bars. At the opposite direction, again in a walking distance, visitors may choose to visit Gazi and Kerameikos which are live hip and artistic neighborhoods with lots of seasonal events (Technopolis, street food festival), bars, theaters and restaurants.

host_about:
We are Bill & John two young entrepreneurs with family ties. We were both born in Athens and continue living in this fascinating city. We have both spent our early years in the tourism and hospitality industry assisting our family in its hotel and tour operator ventures. Bill holds a bachelor in Hospitality Management & International Tourism and John holds a bachelor in Marketing & Communication.

neighborhood_overview:
The Exarcheia neighbourhood is located in the heart of Athens. Sitting between Lycabettus and Omonoia, it is known for its vibrant artistic and street culture, with cafes, restaurants, and outdoor cinemas and lifestyle concentrated near Exarcheia square and the pedestrian streets that lead to Strefi or Lycabettus Hill. It is home to the Athens Polytechnic and its students and the National Archaeological Museum.

Neapoli is the quiet end of the neighbourhood with all amenities at your doorstep, offering some respite from the bustle of Athens and Exarcheia Square.

The neighbourhood is at the foothills of Lycabettus hill, walking distance to Omonoia, and Panepistimio metro stations. Longer cross city walks take you the historic centre of Monastiraki, Plaka and the Acropolis. name: Colorful Apartment Close to the Acropolis
description:
The apartment features bright colors, red marble countertops from the ancient quarry of Ritsona, as well as wood and mosaic floors, giving it an edgy aesthetic. It is spacious and very flexible, with sliding doors either dividing or uniting all spaces, thus making it ideal for families, friends and couples alike.

The master bedroom has a comfortable queen bed with a high quality mattress and ample wardrobe space. The secondary bedroom is a playful space ideal for children and young people with a double bed placed on an elevated platform. The bathroom features a spacious shower and the sink sits in a luxurious marble niche. The kitchen is equipped with ceramic stoves, toaster, kettle, coffee machine, fridge and washing machine, as well as the basic ingredients for breakfast.

name: Acropolis Gem by GHH
description: High end  penthouse apartment in excellent location in the center of Athens that can host up to 8 guests. Great views to Philopappou hill from the balcony and to Acropolis from the bedroom
host_about:
Find your own home in Greece, for holidays or any kind of travel via Golden Home Holidays!
The beauties of Greece invite you to enjoy the country's light, sea, history, culture, ambiance, hospitality... 
We are your new host. We take you beyond the narrow confines of a hotel and welcome you into a house that shall be your home, for as long as you wish -on beautiful Greek islands, in Athens and in numerous destinations worth visiting. We have secured high-quality accommodation and service facilities in luxury villas, select country houses as well as beautiful apartments for a dream holiday or a business trip tailored to your needs, aiming to make you feel at home. 
Visit museums and monuments that attract millions of visitors from all over the world. Delight in the renowned blue sky of Attica. Enjoy a short or longer trip to the wonderful islands or an excursion to the dozens of well-organized beaches and dreamy quiet coasts. Indulge in a dream cruise in the astonishing Aegean Sea. Stroll around plazas, shopping streets and historic quarters. Feel the beauty of simple pleasures in a typical Greek coffeehouse or local tavern. Savoir the theater, music and arts in a country known as the cradle of civilization, which has fostered culture through the centuries. Check out the numerous night entertainment options in a city that never sleeps!
We have created an alternative approach to holidays and to business travel, especially for those of you who love to combine the coziness of a home with your favorite amenities, without a strict schedule, but with special care. You deserve to enjoy unforgettable holidays, tailored to your own needs! You are free to travel for business in your own home in Greece!

host_about:
Hello there! We are JJ Hospitality, a vacation rental company started by a couple of guys who are passionate about travelling in this beautiful country. All the properties you see here have been hand selected by us, and we have even spent the night as guests ourselves to ensure they meet our standards. We do our best to ensure you have a delightful, exciting and trouble free vacation when visiting Greece.
A few words about us: John C is an architect turned hotelier, and Ioannis (Greek name for John) is a finance guru who also has prior experience in the high-end tourism sector. Together we make JJ Hospitality, purveyors of exclusive holiday rentals! Check us out on jjhospitality.net for more info.
Happy travels:)

name: Cozy Apartment in Athens with Balcony and Wifi
description:
Within walking distance to all sights and attractions, this beautifully appointed one-bedroom flat sports a
balcony, an inviting living area with a sofa bed, a luxurious bathroom with a rain shower and a fully
equipped kitchen. With all the amenities of home, high-quality linen and towels, reliable internet, a/c in all
rooms and much more, this is your ideal base in Athens.
neighborhood_overview:
Staying in the vibrant Pagrati area means you're surrounded by Athens' vibrant energy – but are also
close to its most iconic landmarks and attractions. Just 700 meters away is the Kallimarmaro Stadium,
the only stadium in the world made entirely of marble, where history and beauty come together. Also
within a short walk is the recently renovated National Portrait Gallery, showcasing stunning works of art,
and the tranquil National Gardens—an ideal spot for a relaxing stroll amidst lush greenery. As you
wander through the gardens towards Syntagma and the historic centre, don't miss Zappeion, a
magnificent neoclassical building that hosts various exhibitions and events throughout the year. And if
you're up for it, the Acropolis is just a 25-minute walk away–but it is also super easy to access it by public
transport. 
For upscale shopping and dining, the chic Kolonaki district is only 1 km from your doorstep. Known for its

See you soon!

Nearby’s- Explore the neighbourhood

Petralona is busy all-day long thanks to a well-balanced blend of Athenian connoisseurs who visit it for its vibrant city life and night scene. Among the many things to do in Athens, Petralona have something for every taste.

The neighborhood is also great for architecture lovers with its beautiful buildings most of which date back to the interwar era and are excellent examples of the Athenian modernism movement.

Petralona really never sleeps, thanks to the colorful crowd that lives, works and has fun in the area.

At the nearby museums one can enjoy a rich taste of the ancient and modern history and art of Athens. Nearby is the Acropolis Museum and the National Museum of Contemporary Art, while Philopappou Hill is ideal for a few hours' excursion and escape from the bustling capital!

description:
Comfortable 52m² apartment on the 2st floor in the heart of Athens. Close to parks Ideal for cool couples, or solo travelers. 45 min away from the airport by metro, very handy when arriving or leaving Athens by plane.
10 min away from the central train station & 15 min walking distance from Ambelokipoi Metro Station, ideal for travelers who want to explore the city!
Next to restaurants, theaters, cinemas & bars of Exarheia.
neighborhood_overview:
Gizi area is located in the heart of Athens. This historical place started taking shape around 1850’s and it is one of the oldest districts of Athens.
All of the famous monuments and tourist attractions of Athens are near to Gizi area. Using the subway, Acropolis and Acropolis museum are 15 minutes away (approx). Other must see places such as: Plaka with the traditional cafes and taverns or Syntagma which is one of the most visited areas of Athens are not far from Exarcheia. If you enjoy art and history you can also visit famous museums such as the National Archaeological Museum, the National Library and other art institutes that are close by. Other well known areas that are near Gizi area are ,Exarcheia, Kolonaki, Eleftherias square, Karitsi square,where you can find many restaurants and have a taste of Athens night life.

Gizi area offers a variety of choices as far as restaurants and bars go. You can also discover a lot of bookstores, theaters and music stages around

host_about:
A very warm welcome from me, Theoharis, the owner of Vilaman ΙΚΕ, the property management company that is running this property.
Having traveled extensively in the Americas, SE Asia and Europe, and being a demanding traveller myself, I adapted my experiences to my native Greece and combined them with our philoxenia: the ancient greek word that literally means a “friend to a stranger” and is synonymous to hospitality. 
For Greeks however, it is something deeper than that., it is an unspoken cultural law that shows generosity and courtesy to strangers. 
In addition, my personal relationship with each property owner allows me to make sure that everything runs smoothly, as desired, so that our every guest feels at home at our properties and takes a unique experience and unforgettable memories back home with them.

name: Acropoli Flat Plaka
description: A wonderful apartment right in the heart of Plaka in Athens..the perfect hotspot location for anyone that wants to be close to the Acropolis and all the pedestrian streets of Plaka and Monastiraki that surround the centre of the town and be right next to the city at the same time..perfect location for every visitor.!
neighborhood_overview:
The recently renovated 100m2 apartment is located in Plaka, one of the oldest and most beautiful neighbourhoods of Athens. The building is literally 150 meters away from the entrance of the Akropoli metro station and next to all the major historical sites of Athens on foot such as Acropolis, Acropolis museum, Kallimarmaro stadium,Adriannes arch etc. Furthermore Dionyssiou Aeropagitou pedestrian street, which is one of the most impressive streets of Athens situated on the upper street just second away offers you a great variety of traditional greek restaurants, bars, cafés and local super market and grocery.
The location enables you to travel anywhere in the city and give you that beautiful essence of having the whole Athens under your feet.
host_about:
My name is Evangelos but people call me Evan. I studied Art & Design and Architecture in London and after lived and worked there for many years, in house/flat renovations, furniture design and handmade bespoke furniture and a lot more woodworking. After 14 years of creative studies and work i decided to start renovating properties in Athens so i could come back to my country to be even more creative here...back home!

I am a very easy going person, always willing to meet new people, travel, learn and explore new things. Always eager to experience new adventures, places, countries, cultures or even good food. A few things i love and can't do without would have to be the sea, and the harmony and peace that comes with it..the sun and the amazing Greek sunsets/sunrises that you can never get or see enough of them...and there is also my active side and my rush for adrenaline..

 There are quite a few extreme sports that i am in to..such as: off road motorbike riding: enduro and motocross..riding up the mountains to reach the highest point and check out the view..or riding through a dense forest and feel the fresh air, along a river and experience a humid or wet ride or even  down the motocross track for a few laps...i also like to surf and SUP, skate and cycle a lot. In general i like to be active and enjoy life and always up to experience new things!

description: ***please before you book, ask us for special prices/offers*Ideally located in the heart and soul of Athens city center and especially in the heart of "neighborhood of the Gods" as it was well known in the past! It has a queen size bed (160*200cm), is full furnished and equipped in order to offer you a full-pleasant stay!3rd floor apt,  a/c, free 50mbps wifi, smart TV&netflix, and nice views from the cute balcony. What else someone needs in order to have a full pleasant vacation?
neighborhood_overview: When someone walks around Plaka, feels like being in a fairytale! plaka is one of the most attractive districts of Athens. Under the slopes of the Acropolis Plaka attracts all the visitors of Athens with its neoclassical mansions and houses with roofs from red tiles, its small winding roads with their steps, balconies with bougainvilleas ,geraniums and jasmines. Plaka is called many times in the Greek literature as the neighbourhood of the Gods and that because over Plaka dominates the sacred rock of the Acropolis "the sacred rock of the gods"  who made the modern Athenians with the same humour like their Ancient ancestors, to  personalise the Olympian gods having fun like them in Plaka with lots of Retsina wine and Dance. Sometimes being romantic on a sunny day you feel  that  the Greek goddess Athena  looks down to Plaka with a smile in her divine face as the modern Athenians enjoy the sunshine in the street cafes at Adrianou street overlooking Thission the Ancient Agora and the rock
host_about: We are from Athens-Greece. we love traveling, meeting new people, making friends and discover new way of thinking and behaviour. We became parents some years ago,  and for this reason, we aren't able to travel (easily) as much as we used to... So being a host make us "feel" like traveling...! Our motto is “We travel not to escape life, but life not to escape us “ ! And when you decide to travel, we feel honored to be a part of your experience!

name: A Unique Gem in the Historic Part of Athens
description: From its trendy furnishings and wood panel walls to its knotty hardwood floors and smart decor, this neoclassical flat offers rest by way of a calm, elegant atmosphere. Gather for supper in a warm dining area with its modern lighting and furnishings.
neighborhood_overview:
Experience the authentic Athenian vibe at one of the most beautiful, historic and classic neighborhoods of Europe. Spacious, luxurious, elegant, with handmade furniture and artistic details in every room, this classic apartment will make your stay unforgettable. Feel its unique bourgeois past with Acropolis at your doorstep and the most wonderful sights just a short walk by. Enjoy its aristocratic design, its modern comforts and the peaceful surrounding right in the heart of Athens center.
Explore Athens like never before!Situated on the longest pedestrian lane in the world, Apostolou Pavlou Street, the apartment is just a stroll away from Athen's most vibrant historic sites, museums, food markets, shops, and restaurants. The Museum of Acropolis is steps away.
host_about:
We are thrilled to welcome you to one of our nocarz apartments in Athens, our goal is to ensure that you have a five-star experience in staying with us. 

We are part of a local fun and exciting hospitality group called MyGreekVacations managing more than 100+ beautifully designed custom-made apartments inspired by our travels and our stays in nocarzs around the world. The experience of meeting so many lovely people along the way is something we particularly enjoy, and the city of Athens is a hub where you can always find things to experience, see and do and we can’t get enough of it.

Our priority is to create a comfortable, relaxing and “home away from home” experience for our guests, a “workation” atmosphere for those who wish to combine business with leisure and to always be readily available and provide as much info and assistance as possible; all the things we value when traveling somewhere new ourselves.

Our home is your home! We treat our guests like lifelong friends and we love to spoil them during their visits.

We hope to see you soon.

Nearest Metro Station: Syntagma (7 min walk-600m) & Monastiraki (6 min walk-450m) Internet up to 24Mbps.
neighborhood_overview: Located between Syntagma and Monastiraki Square, the area of Plaka offers an experience that goes beyond and stands out from the rest of Athens. Shopping, dining, and culture are all reachable on foot.
host_about:
Hi! We are UPSTREET and we would like to welcome you to your new home away from home!

Combining our genuine love for Athens with our professional knowledge, we aim to offer you the best time during your accommodation.

Even if you are traveling for a few days or for a while, our freshly renovated apartments are in central and vibrant locations, ready to provide you with the most reliable services and amenities.

Your experience is not based on luck or the choices of each owner anymore. Live only the surprises you signed up for and get to know the city like a local.

The best things might be waiting for you upstreet. Get ready and just enjoy the ride!

description:
Spend your days in Athens in a spacious apartment in Koukaki. Stylish and homey, within steps of the city's premier attractions.
Sleeps 3 comfortably. Lots of room to move around with a king-size bed and a comfy sofa in the living room. The apartment is on the 2nd floor with elevator. With a balcony to enjoy a morning coffee in the sun and a comfortable bathroom to pamper yourself in the shower or the bathtub!
neighborhood_overview:
Every Friday morning from May till the first days of November, there is street market with fruits and vegetables that you could enjoy!
From November the street market is at Zaxaritsa street.

name: Treat yourself w. this central City-break studio!
description: Located in the outskirts of Plaka neighborhood, in the heart of both historical and modern Athens, this hip decorated, and October 2017 refurbished studio provides its guests with direct access to all sightseeings. Bars, restaurants, subway, bus and train stops are within 3 minutes walking distance.
neighborhood_overview:
Syntagma and Plaka, are what Times Square is for NYC... The Greek parliament, ministries, bars and restaurants, theaters, all the major brands and the famous retail street of Ermou are literally around the corner. Its upbeat character will keep you hooked since there is never enough time to enjoy all the cozy cafeterias in the area!

Syntagma is really multicultural neighborhood since you can find people from all over the world, not only visiting, but also working in Athens. As you exit the apartment you will find many cafeterias, bars, theatres and restaurants serving Greek, Indian, Sushi, Chinese, Thai, German, and many more :)

The apartment is 3 minutes away from “Syntagma” square from where not only the metro, but also busses and trams pass by!

While walking during the daytime you can meet a variety of locals, from businessmen and actors to students and tourists.

Acropolis, the Acropolis museum, Plaka, Monastiraki flea market, as well as L
host_about:
Kalimera (=Good Morning)! I am Alexandros, an ex-financier who turned into an entrepreneur.

I grew up in Athens, Greece, an awesome and vibrant city, where I studied Civil Engineering at NTUA. I was always keen on music, a passion which I flipped into DJing, yeap!!! Following my graduation I wanted to see the world and study abroad, so I attended Columbia University in NYC for my second Masters degree. The 2008 crash sent me directly to Germany where I started my career in banking.

After some years in corporate environments I decided to follow my real love, which is creating things from scratch, so I quit my job and alongside with my brother, George, we began a hospitality start-up.

We provide unique furnished apartments by offering personalized services!

It is so awesome to be an explorer and we believe that if you do not travel is like reading only the cover of the book. Hence,  t-r-a-v-e-l  :)

We hope to enjoy your staying with us!!!!

Keep it real,
Alexandros.

name: 04 Studio @ heart of Neapoli. Luminous & Acropolis
description:
We are HostPal and we will be honored to host you.
This minimal and cozy studio offers a beautiful space of 30 sqm & a terrace to enjoy the Acropolis & Lycabettus! The flat was fully renovated in 2019 to a high standard. It is located @ ♡ of Neapoli > the crossroad of Kolonaki & Exarcheia.
Despite its small size it offers most things for your adventure in Athens.
A home away from home!
neighborhood_overview:
Kolonaki is a vibrant & young area with trendy restaurants & cafes & boutique shops. Kolonaki is also known as the "Mayfair" of Athens! Exarcheia is the alternative & intellectual side of Athens which never fails to amaze with its’ unique local color!


•Everything is located within a few minutes’ walk: cafes, restaurants, groceries, pharmacies, bakeries, convenient stores, super markets, boutiques, hair salons, you name it, it is nearby!
•Exarcheia, which is considered one of the most artistic neighborhoods in Athens is 600m away
•Kolonaki, which is the Mayfair of Athens, with its small boutiques and luxurious shops is also less than 1km away.
•The French Institut (Institut Francais) is ~200m away
•The commercial center of Athens is just 850meters away
host_about:
We are HostPal! and will be thrilled to host you in our properties!
We combine our personal touch and local knowledge with professionalism to offer you the best possible experience during your stay in Athens. Our goal is to make your trip here memorable! 
We provide a detailed cleaning before your arrival, clean sheets & towels, maps & info of Athens and concierge for anything you may need during your stay, providing tips and info you can have access to only as a local!
But most importantly we provide a warm and personalized welcome. 

PS: If you are looking for a house in Greece, or if you would like to buy a property of any kind, maybe we could be of assistance to you.

name: Sunflower Premium Penthouse, side Acropolis view
description: Sunflower Penthouse has been designed just for you, as hospitality is our passion! Fully renovated  to serve the needs even of the most demanding guest!  It's 55m² top floor (5th) penthouse, in a quiet neighbourhood  in the city centre of Athens. Located 300m from Attiki Metro station & 400m from  Larissa Metro & Train station offers easy and quick access to all Athenian  hot spots. In the spacious terrace you may enjoy your wine under the stars enjoying the illuminated Acropolis.
neighborhood_overview:
Stay in Sunflower Penthouse and live like a local, in a family safe, original Athenian neighbourhood. Our neighbourhoud "Sepolia" is the motherland of Giannis Antetokounmpo, the famous NBA player. Being just 3 minute away from Attiki Metro station gives you with easy access to all the Athenian hot spots, while it's a short ride to the city’s historical center.

Within a radius of 200 meters you could find Supermarkets, cafe, restaurants, bakeries, butcher shop, grocery store, pharmacies, hair salons, beauty spa, nail spa and more. Branches & ATMs of all major banks are also nearby to assist you with any financial service you may require.
Also being in walking distance (400m away) from Larissa Station, the central train station of Athens, provides you easy access to all major cities and destinations surrounding Athens.

name: ✰Bright, renovated, spacious & cosy studio✰
description:
Our cozy apartment is remodeled and equipped to meet all your needs.
It is sunny, and spacious, located in the heart of Athens, on Pallados str, walking distance from the famous archaeological spaces, lively shopping areas, Greek restaurants & cosmopolitan bars!
Ideal for
~ Couples who want to explore the sights of our historic city
~ Business people due to its strategic location next to all the means of transport
~ Travelers who wish to experience the real Athenian life, culture & cuisine!
neighborhood_overview:
In Athens, all the roads lead to Monastiraki!
A blend of historical eras, architecture, and cultures, located at the heart of the city, no matter what you are looking for, Monastiraki and the nearby neighborhoods of Psiri and Plaka have it all!
Begin your vacation with a coffee in one of the rooftop cafes and capture your new profile pic with a dramatic backdrop of the Acropolis. Walk the 3000-year-old alleys and streets, take a tour of the Acropolis and its monuments and discover fascinating myths and stories. Find a bargain at the flea market, discover quirky boutiques, eat your vacation out in any of the restaurants favored by visitors and locals alike, and keep some energy to enjoy the vibrant nightlife!
host_about:
Let me introduce myself and my wonderful co-hosts, my parents :)
I am Danai, born and raised in Athens, and currently working as a flight attendant. As you can imagine, I feel your need to get out there, explore places, meet new people and taste new cuisines!
My father gets you as well. He was a sea captain, speaks several languages, and if you ask him to join you for a coffee, beware! He has far too many stories to share :)
My mother was -and still is for the family- a head nurse. When you meet her, you will immediately feel her sense of Greek hospitality and well, her nursing nature :).
We are travelers ourselves, and we want for you, what we want for ourselves. A safe, cozy environment to have an unforgettable time. Looking forward to meeting you and being a piece of your Athenian adventure!

Great location, as it is walking distance from public transportation as well as with quick & easy access to the most trendy shops.The area is a foodie heaven with some of Athen’s best restaurants, bars and cafes right outside the door. name: Cozy Studio in the heart of Athens w/Balcony & Gym
description: The GiantG studio in Hercules Residence is located in one of the most wonderful locations of Athens downtown, with anything you may need and much much more! The private balcony will take your breath away!
neighborhood_overview:
Thissio is the most interesting neighborhood of Athens. The apartment is located between Gazi and Thissio, which make it an ideal choice for travellers of all age and type, as there is always something for everyone going on.
Gazi is the trendy neighborhood where many bistros, bars, restaurants are located and it is the best place to be during the day or the night. Head to the Parthenon and Acropolis which is just 15 minutes’ walk away, visit the museums and the archaeological sights around Acropolis, go to the open air cinema that is multi awarded as the best open air cinema in the world that is at just a 10 minutes’ walk, enjoy your meal or your drink or coffee overlooking the amazing Acropolis and Filoppapou Hill, and be amazed by the Greek ancient neighborhood where democracy were born and philosophy changed the world.
Mini markets, bakeries, taverns and coffee shops are around the corner so you will not miss anything during your stay.
host_about:
We are thrilled to welcome you to one of our nocarz apartments in Athens, our goal is to ensure that you have a five-star experience in staying with us. 

We are part of a local fun and exciting hospitality group called MyGreekVacations managing more than 100+ beautifully designed custom-made apartments inspired by our travels and our stays in nocarzs around the world. The experience of meeting so many lovely people along the way is something we particularly enjoy, and the city of Athens is a hub where you can always find things to experience, see and do and we can’t get enough of it.

Our priority is to create a comfortable, relaxing and “home away from home” experience for our guests, a “workation” atmosphere for those who wish to combine business with leisure and to always be readily available and provide as much info and assistance as possible; all the things we value when traveling somewhere new ourselves.

Our home is your home! We treat our guests like lifelong friends and we love to spoil them during their visits.

We hope to see you soon.

name: Dinostratus House, Corner Studio Apartment
description: Dinostratus House is an independent, small holiday-apartment house. With eight modern, clean (disinfected), high end studio apartments, we serve short and mid-term guests. Our central location is in a very friendly neighborhood, close to Acropolis and Temple of Olympian Zeus, with great infrastructure. The apartments are fully furnished and equipped with kitchenette, private bathroom and some with balcony or terrace. All apartments are disinfected, as travel safety is key priority.
neighborhood_overview: The part of Neos Cosmos where we're located is not only a very friendly neighborhood, close to Acropolis and Temple of Olympian Zeus, with great infrastructure. But this is one of the hidden gem, where you'll love going home. Street market on every second Monday, lots of local shops, cafe's, restaurants, where you can eat like locals.
host_about:
Hi,

I'm Laszlo. Welcome to Dinostratus House in the heart of Athens.

We run apartments in Budapest since 2010 and now we opened up our first business in Athens. I hope you'll love it. :)

Athens is a really vivid and colorful city to explore! The atmosphere of the antique World mixed with the modern is just indescribable. Cafe's, restaurants, bars make this city more interesting and irresistible.

I'd like you to see and feel as much as possible. We provide whatever is necessary to make your stay comfortable! :)

Feel free to contact me with any questions.

Cheers:

Laszlo & Eszter

Athens is a really vivid and colorful city to explore! The atmosphere of the antique World mixed with the modern is just indescribable. Cafe's, restaurants, bars make this city more interesting and irresistible.

I'd like you to see and feel as much as possible. We provide whatever is necessary to make your stay comfortable! :)

Feel free to contact me with any questions.

Cheers:

Laszlo & Eszter

name: A Spacious Apartment One Min To Victoria Metro
description:
This spacious apartment-140 sq. meter with 2 bathrooms-is located in a safe neighbourhood right on Victoria square (1 min away from Victoria Metro) in the center of Athens. Everything is brand new -May 2019- inside the flat. All bedrooms are air-conditioned and can easily sleep up to 10 persons.
Netflix is provided for watching the best series and movies!
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a really lively,multicultural and safe neighbourhood in the heart of Athens.
Restaurants,24h food take away,coffee shops,supermarkets and bakeries are 1 minute away from the flat. Moreover,there is a pharmacy at the basement of the building.
For parking your car there is a 24/7 garage which is 1 minute walking from the apartment. The charge is 7 euros per day.
Laundry store is 2 minutes away on foot.
host_about:
I'm a sociable and easy going, 32 year old, Greek citizen. My first nocarz experience was in the U.S.A back on 2013. After that trip I’ve decided to create my profile on the platform
I have travelled around the world several times and I could give advice on anything a traveller would need.I have been to Indonesia, Mexico, Marocco all around Europe,U.S.A.(New York,Boston),India,Nepal and Thailand.
I have been living in Athens since I was born.I love going out so I know every place you should visit.I personally prefer to have a good time without spending a fortune.I prefer to move around the city by bicycle or public transport since everything is nearby.
My favourite leisure activity is listening to music,watching movies and riding my bike.
I have obtained a degree in Statistics at the University of Economics and Business in Athens.
I also adore the sea and my passion is sailing. Moreover,I cooperate with a company which is specialised in cruise day trips.
If you like to sail keep in mind that in only 30 minutes away from the flat, you can reach the Athens Riviera and discover from a cruise ship the most beautiful secret of the city,the Saronic Gulf!!!

name: Plaka Akrokeramo House #2
description: Welcome to the historic city of Athens and the Plaka district where our beautiful neoclassical house is located. Immerse yourself in the city's rich history with walking distance to the Acropolis, Acropolis Museum, Fillopapou Hill, Ancient Agora, Monastiraki flea market, Syntagma Square, and more.
neighborhood_overview:
The amazing neighborhood of Plaka, also known as the "Neighborhood of the Gods". This place has so much history as it's built on top of the ancient town of Athens. You can explore the picturesque area of Anafiotika which looks like an island with its charming white-washed houses, narrow streets, steps, stone walls, and gardens full of colorful flowers.

The best part is that Plaka is just a stone's throw away from the Acropolis hill, which means you can immerse yourself in ancient Greek history and culture with ease. And when the sun sets, the neighborhood comes alive with countless options for food, drink, and entertainment. You can enjoy traditional tavernas, cozy wine bars, lively clubs, and live music venues. Believe me, you won't be disappointed!

name: Gaia | King Interior Room | Historical Center
description: Where the comforts of home meet the local stylish influences of the central Psirri neighborhood - GAIA offers a stay like no other for travelers looking to experience real Greece, and live the local way! With our newly renovated rooms, guests are invited to immerse themselves in Athens’ culture with all necessary amenities at their disposal. Sit back on your sofa and soak up the welcoming Psirri atmosphere, in your homely King Interior Room, ideal for individuals and couples.
neighborhood_overview:
We are very fortunate at GAIA to be based in the centre of Athens’ old town, the heart of our modern-ancient capital, where guests will find the likes of the Acropolis, the ancient Roman Agora, the (modern!) central shopping area and many other sites worth visiting only a walk away! If you’re wanting to discover more of Psirri, our buzzing local neighbourhood, and its captivating energy, we recommend stepping out in the evening to explore the best eateries and bars our community (and to be honest, the city) has to offer, and all right at your doorstep! Get yourself ready for a night of authentic non-stop Greek dining and, if you’re brave enough to survive the early hours, Athens’ famous never-ending nightlife!

You’ll find us conveniently located within walking distance from Monastiraki station, and among the best local hangouts in Athens! The Gaia family is proud to be part of a community that represents the very soul of the city - eclectic, lively and on-trend. Experience r
host_about:
Kalimera, I’m Alex, and welcome to Athens! At Gaia, we encourage our guests to enjoy what the real Greece has to offer and we want to show you that the local way is the only way!

Being Greek, family and hospitality is deeply rooted within our culture, and is at the heart of everything we do here at Gaia. We want our guests to feel right at home in our wonderful city, and however long your stay, we promise to make it a truly enjoyable authentic Greek experience; come and discover what it means to live the local way!

Guests’ safety and comfort is at the top of our list, and we strive to make sure your stay at Gaia meets all your needs as a home from home - we are proud this summer to offer our guests newly renovated rooms, with optimum comfort in mind. I learnt from a young age the value of hospitality and I understand how important it is to feel at home, more than ever when you are away. Growing up with and working in hospitality, I was inspired by my love of meeting new people, making connections, and most of all, helping these people get the most out of their experiences - so much so, that I have formed a career around the business of making this happen! We want to make sure guests don’t just have a place to stay, but gain as much as they can from their visit to Athens! People come from all parts of the world to visit our amazing city as their chosen holiday destination - it’s my job (and my pleasure!) to help make their experience the best it can possibly be!

Athens to me is home; the people, the kindness shown within the community and to strangers alike - we have an amazing atmosphere here, and it’s one you won’t find anywhere else in the world. Here in Athens we like to have fun, we delight in the old and embrace the new - which you’ll see wherever you walk within the city - the beautiful meeting of Modern and Ancient Greece. A city that has it all, everything for everyone - and so much more than a visit to the Acropolis! I want to share this special connection I have with the city with others, and encourage visitors, both Greek and international, to explore the place I’m proud to call home. Let me show you my Athens! 

Psirri in particular, is the buzzing neighbourhood where you’ll find us (along with the best hangouts and eateries in Athens!) - the Gaia family is proud to be part of a community that represents the very soul of the city. Experience real Greece here; eat what the locals do, drink with us, explore our streets you haven’t read about yet, take a walk through our history, modern and ancient - and live the local way!

Since my family and I began constructing Gaia in 2016, we have worked hard to expand, and are now able to offer more options for our guests seeking independent accommodation within the heart of the city. With our guests’ needs in mind, we’re now managing premium apartments, in the perfect location, which capture the authenticity and spirit of Psyri; you’ll be able to experience the real Athens like a local, with all the amenities you need to feel at home.
 
Gaia was created by family for family - since we started out as a small hotel with only a few rooms open, people have loved staying with us because of our incredible culture of going above and beyond when it comes to hospitality - my family has always lived by this principle, and we welcome all of our guests as we do our own family - we’ll make sure you won’t leave Athens without a full stomach, a story to tell and a promise to come back and visit! We look forward to welcoming you soon!

name: Central & Elegant - Bluscapes Home
description: This spacious -130 sqm/1400 sq.ft - urban chic apartment is the perfect choice for friends or family with up to five persons who want both, to be in the heart of the city and at the same time have privacy. It is located in Kolonaki, the central posh neighbourhood of Athens, just 5 minutes walking distance from Syntagma Square and the historical center of the city. Perfect home base to explore Athens. Situated on the 6th floor and fully renovated to fullfil the needs of a demanding traveler.
neighborhood_overview: A bakery, a grocery store, two super markets, a dry cleaners, a florist shop, hair and nail salon and a pastry shop around the block. A large variety of restaurants and bars to satisfy all tastes and needs.
host_about:
Following a corporate career of more than 25 years, I have devoted the last 7 years of my professional life materializing a lifelong dream and mission: creating unique experiences for demanding, discerning, tasteful and refined guests who visit Greece for vacation or professional purposes. 

I have established, own and operate two companies: BLUSCAPES HOMES which owns and manages unique properties and BLUSCAPES YACHTING which owns and manages three luxury motor yachts. 

There are four differentiating factors that make us distinctive in creating unique experiences for our distinguished guests: (1) the fact that we own and manage the properties (and yachts), with myself being personally and directly involved in operating the properties and serving our guests; (2) the extreme attention to detail and quality, directly visible in all properties; (3) the refined and sophisticated interior design and functionality of the properties; and (4) the capability to offer a wide variety of highest quality optional services within the properties and the yachts (e.g., private chef, on site constant guest service and house-keeping) and beyond (e.g., organization of cultural, entertainment and sightseeing experiences both in and outside Athens tailored to our guests preferences - including personal guides if relevant, advice and reservations in restaurants & bars in line with our guests tastes and luxury transportation for all possible guest needs).

host_about:
A very warm welcome from me, Theoharis, the owner of Vilaman ΙΚΕ, the property management company that is running this property.
Having traveled extensively in the Americas, SE Asia and Europe, and being a demanding traveller myself, I adapted my experiences to my native Greece and combined them with our philoxenia: the ancient greek word that literally means a “friend to a stranger” and is synonymous to hospitality. 
For Greeks however, it is something deeper than that., it is an unspoken cultural law that shows generosity and courtesy to strangers. 
In addition, my personal relationship with each property owner allows me to make sure that everything runs smoothly, as desired, so that our every guest feels at home at our properties and takes a unique experience and unforgettable memories back home with them.

neighborhood_overview:
Discover the Elegance of Kolonaki:

Kolonaki is Athens' most affluent and sophisticated district, perfect for both business and leisure stays. As one of the city's premier shopping areas, it boasts high-end boutiques featuring everything from contemporary fashion to prestigious haute couture, alongside with luxury jewelry stores.

Kolonaki is also home to renowned museums and galleries. Explore the Benaki Museum, housed in a beautiful neoclassical manor, and the Goulandris Museum of Cycladic Art, showcasing exceptional private collections. The Museum of the History of Greek Costume and the Theater Museum offer fascinating insights into their specialized fields. Nearby, the Byzantine Museum and the War Museum of Athens provide additional cultural experiences.

name: 3 mins walking from Acropolis
description: This fully renovated (Feb 2019) and fully equipped 50 s.q.m modern, cozy, and stylish apartment in the heart of Koukaki. Perfect for 2-3 people, it's located on one of the most beautiful streets, minutes walking distance from Acropolis, Syntagma, museums, Plaka, and Monastiraki. Book now to experience the best of Athens in style!
neighborhood_overview:
Athens’ Hippest Neighborhoods: The Kaleidoscope of Koukaki
Nestled in the shadow of the Acropolis and more famous districts like Plaka, lies one of the city's most creative and charming corners.

In the shadow of the Acropolis, the neighborhood of Koukaki, with its unevenly paved sidewalks lined with bitter orange trees, has an undeniably urban village feel. It is the lesser-known sister of Makriyianni, which, boasting the elegant Acropolis Museum on the sweeping cobbled esplanade of Dionysiou Areopagitou, has relegated Koukaki to the status of just another residential district.

Yet this unassuming neighborhood has begun to capture the attention of Athenians and visitors alike. For the latter, it is perhaps best known for its staggering popularity as an nocarz destination, ranking in the top five most interesting neighborhoods in the world to stay. It isn’t difficult to understand why.

By night, the warmly lit Filopappou monument, the colorful light

description:
Welcome to Athens Charmer !! We are located in the popular location bordering Koukaki and Neos Kosmos and less than 1 km from the Acropolis and its famous Museum.

Other well-known historical sites are within a 1-2km radius and a short 10-15 minute walk. If shopping and trendy cafes or traditional restaurants are your passion the centre of Athens is also nearby with Plaka, Monastiraki, Syntagma and Ermou Street only 1km and a short stroll away.

The neighborhood is alive and yet quiet. Theres everything at your fingertips. Food, ATM's, Metro stations, entertainment
Within the immediate neighborhood are traditional bakeries, delicatessen and bars and there is a supermarket located only 50 metres away. Also conveniently located is an ATM at 300 metres, Sigroufix Metro at 550 metres and the tram line at 450 metres away. Elefthérios Venizélos Airport is 34 km away.

name: Raise Boutique room 21 in the center of Athens
description: Brand new fully renovated hotel style rooms at Psiri area in the center of Athens.
neighborhood_overview: Psirri is an old neighbourhood of Athens located north-west of Monastiraki. The area consists of many old houses most of which were deserted and ruined. However, over the years, Psiri has changed a lot. Some of the neoclassical buildings have been restored and a lot of trendy bars and shops have opened. Today, it attracts many young Athenians who enjoy the blend of traditional and modern character of the area. Narrow streets which are bordered with picturesque taverns and cozy cafes and bars as well as nice shops with cheap products. Restaurants with live Greek music receive a great number of people, especially during the weekends. Psiri is not so popular among tourists but it is an excellent choice for a night out in the centre of Athens. It is found really close to Monastiraki and Plaka.
host_about: We love to provide a great stay to our guests. We are raising our standards every day.  theraiseprojects

name: Syntagma Apartment 8 @ Central Athens
description:
The Apartment has just been renovated. The remake took place on March 2019.
Everything is New! The target was to offer a Simplicity Feel with High End Standards and offer the best possible Value for Money in The City of Athens at service of the nocarz community. Incomparable Location in Athens, some seconds away from Syntagma Square and the beautiful Plaka. Immediate access with metro or Bus to the Airport. Top Choice!
neighborhood_overview:
Our apartment is located in Syntagma, the heart of Athens. In just few steps you will find yourself wondering around the beautiful and famous alleys of Plaka.

Syntagma square - Plaka - New Acropolis Museum 
 
Being on Syntagma square you can easily enter the area of Plaka which is the oldest and most prestigious neighbourhood of Athens. Attached to the Holy Rock of Acropolis it’s a “must-see” area for every visitor setting foot in Athens. It’s unique, it’s picturesque, full of labyrinthine alleys. It’s like a journey to the past. Don’t miss the chance to stroll around “Anafiotika” , a cosy district of Plaka that looks like a small island popped from the north slope of Acropolis. Plaka’s main pedestrian - only Kidathinaion and Adrianou you can find plenty of stores selling traditional goods, souvenirs, folk artifacts and Greek traditional food products. At Plaka’s alleys you will come along many traditional Athenian taverns (see more to TASTE), museums (see more to
host_about:
I am Christina, on my early 30s working on the fashion industry and running a production line for women clothes. 
Since my family is into the Hotel business I was brought up into the hotelier world! We own Hotels in Athens and the Peloponnese and although nocarz is kind of a cultural exchange, it still needs to be professional fulfilling high end standards!

name: Mind-blowing petite studio in the heart of Athens!
description:
Conveniently located in the heart of historical Athens, this 2019 utterly reconstructed studio is in the premises of an iconic shoe-factory from the 70’s, that was converted into a serviced condo-building.

It provides its guests with direct access to all MUST visit attractions. Bars, restaurants, metro, bus and train stops, as well as all the major historical sites are within 3 minutes walking distance.

Constant WiFi and a fully equipped private kitchen are a few of the free offered amenities.
neighborhood_overview:
Psyri, a hip neighborhood, used to have in its premises the majority of the leather traders and craftsmen till the mid 80’s. Now, it has been transformed to a vibrant area full of stylish bars, traditional cafes and restaurants.

While walking during the daytime you can meet a variety of people, from local businessmen to students and from tourists to men selling and bargaining used stuff in the street.

Acropolis, the Acropolis museum, Kallimarmaro, Thisio, Plaka, Monastiraki flea market, as well as Syntagma square and all the upbeat Athens neighborhoods are in the immediate vicinity.

Upon arrival, we provide you with tailor-made recommendations. Enjoy “Athens by night” while being minutes from home ;)
host_about:
Kalimera (=Good Morning)! I am Alexandros, an ex-financier who turned into an entrepreneur.

I grew up in Athens, Greece, an awesome and vibrant city, where I studied Civil Engineering at NTUA. I was always keen on music, a passion which I flipped into DJing, yeap!!! Following my graduation I wanted to see the world and study abroad, so I attended Columbia University in NYC for my second Masters degree. The 2008 crash sent me directly to Germany where I started my career in banking.

After some years in corporate environments I decided to follow my real love, which is creating things from scratch, so I quit my job and alongside with my brother, George, we began a hospitality start-up.

We provide unique furnished apartments by offering personalized services!

It is so awesome to be an explorer and we believe that if you do not travel is like reading only the cover of the book. Hence,  t-r-a-v-e-l  :)

We hope to enjoy your staying with us!!!!

Keep it real,
Alexandros.

name: Athens Color Cube / Aqua Apartment
description:
Aqua apartment is in the center of historic Athens, 250m from Monastiraki Square, on a major pedestrian street with all Athens' attractions steps away/ walking distance.

Renovated to luxury level, offers one bedroom and an open space kitchen/ living room, totalling 42sqm (452sqf), where it can comfortably host 4 people.
High Speed Internet & smart TV is provided. KNX smart home technology guarantees pleasant features to guests.

For the benefits of all guests, smoking and pets are not allowed.
neighborhood_overview:
Athens Color Cube Luxury Apartments are located in the heart of Athens’ Historic Centre, at Aiolou street. 250m from Monastiraki Metro Station. Aiolou Street is the epicentre of the Commercial Triangle of Athens, one of the most historic neighbourhoods. Important buildings and monuments of Athens’ architectural and cultural heritage are to be found here, along with long-standing local commercial businesses and the City’s bustling night life activity. Every street and corner of this neighbourhood is part of this city’s lively history. Based on the Color Cube Apartments you can walk to Acropolis/ Partheonon and Plaka, visit the Monastiraki flea market or the Syntagma square and the National Gardens.
150m away from the Color Cube Apartments, Aiolou street reaches the major Athenian archaeological area, at the foothills of Acropolis, where landmarks classical Greece’s antiquities can be found, such as the ancient Agora & Library, wind tower and ancient galleries where famous Greek phi
host_about:
'Athens Color Cube' is a project which proves that architecture can thrive, while providing a pleasant, modern and luxurious hospitality gateway in the very center of Athens:
	We believe that hosting is a combination of many little things that make our guests content every time they reach our apartments
	We like clean lines, spotless surfaces and emphasis on modern minimalism which promotes a comfortable stay 
	We love convenience, technology and smart home
	We enjoy being the city epicenter, linking our ancient vicinity, to our modern apartments
	We appreciate the communication with our guests. 

We are proud to present the six modern and sophisticated apartments of 'Athens Color Cube' project, located in the most convenient pedestrian street at the heart of historic Athens.

name: Urban studio in Athens, next to Sygrou- Fix metro
description: Experience Athens from this charming, fully renovated 30 sqm urban studio in the vibrant Koukaki neighborhood. Located just a 2-minute walk from Syngrou-Fix metro station and within easy reach of Monastiraki and the Acropolis, this cozy retreat is perfect for couples or travelers. Featuring modern amenities like a fully equipped kitchen, air conditioning, a private entrance, and free street parking, this apartment offers both comfort and convenience for exploring the historical heart of Athens.
neighborhood_overview:
**The Neighborhood**
Located in the heart of the lively *Koukaki* neighborhood, this urban studio offers a truly authentic Athenian experience. Koukaki is one of the city's trendiest areas, known for its vibrant atmosphere, charming streets, and a plethora of cafes, traditional tavernas, and unique shops. As a local favorite, it is a perfect spot for immersing yourself in the real Athens while being just steps away from major attractions.

Only a 2-minute walk from the *Syngrou-Fix* metro station, you’ll have quick and easy access to popular landmarks like the *Acropolis*, *Acropolis Museum*, and *Monastiraki*. Enjoy a short 15-minute stroll to reach these iconic historical sites. The area balances modern life with historical charm, offering a unique setting for visitors to explore both ancient and urban Athens.

Being close to *Philopappou Hill*, a beautiful green space, you can go for a relaxing walk or enjoy breathtaking views of the Acropolis. This nei
host_about: Welcome to our world of adventure & hospitality! We are a team of lively and diverse individuals who share a passion for connecting with people from all around the world. We offer exceptional accommodation to families, business travelers, and adventure lovers, with fully-furnished and expertly designed apartments, creating the perfect balance of Comfort & Style. Discover a world of vibrant energy, personalized care, and unforgettable experiences.

There is a supermarket and a bakery at walking distance from the appartment.

name: KERAMOS Athens - Bauhaus design Apartment B1
description:
A luminous apartment on the 1st floor of our 1930s renovated apart-hotel, right in the heart of Kerameikos, 5 mins from Metro.

The high ceilings and the parquet wooden floors give the essence of how traditional Athenian homes used to be.

The smart lock will allow you via electronic key (bluetooth enabled mobile required) to enter the apartment at any time.
neighborhood_overview:
Keramikos (or Kerameikos) is named after Keramos, son of Dionysos and Ariadne, hero of the potters. Potters always lived in the area, in the banks of the Eridanos river that used to be here, along with the cemetery of ancient Athens.

Keramikos has always been an urban Athens neighborhood. Today you can find modern lofts and typical mid-war period houses, influenced by the modernist architecture of the 30s and the 50s and the Bauhaus school.
During the recent years Keramikos with the adjacent areas of Gazi and Metaxourgio has been transformed into the ‘hip’ area of Athens. Funky and international cuisine restaurants coexist with traditional taverns, modern bars, countless theaters, museums and gay clubs. An area that remains residential, while becoming a lively neighborhood of the Athens Historical Center, with special events all year round, such as the annual Metaxourgio Carnival Street Party, in the Carnival season.

name: Athenian Exclusive Residence, Athens Heritage Res.
description: The Athenian Exclusive Residence is a 140-square-meter apartment located in Vassilis Sofias Street, Athens. This elegant four-bedroom apartment offers the perfect blend of comfort and modern amenities, ideal for families or groups.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood around Vasilissis Sofias Avenue in Athens is a prestigious and central area, known for its blend of historic charm and modern amenities. This location is situated in one of the city's most important avenues, close to cultural landmarks, embassies, and government buildings. The area is home to elegant neoclassical architecture as well as modern apartments, offering a refined urban living environment.

Vasilissis Sofias Avenue itself is lined with museums such as the Byzantine and Christian Museum and the National Gallery, both within walking distance. The iconic Lycabettus Hill and the upscale district of Kolonaki are nearby, providing a vibrant cultural and social scene with luxury boutiques, fine dining, and trendy cafés. Public transportation is readily available, making it easy to access the rest of the city.

Green spaces like the National Garden and the quieter neighborhood streets add a touch of serenity to the otherwise bustling urban environ

name: Athenian Apartments - Syntagma sq. #5
description: "Syntagma Family apartment" is one of the five apartments in the building at "15 Voulis st." of "Athenian apartments". They are all in the heart of the city. Feel the beat, enjoy it!
neighborhood_overview:
There are plenty of sights to see in Athens including classic ones like Acropolis, museums, ancient remains, and "Monastiraki" flea market. You can also visit National garden, "Kalimarmaro stadium", and Temple of "Zeus". Take in the city view from the hill of "Lecabetus or "Filoppapou". Explore every street for hidden gems such as coffee shops, restaurants, and unique stores.

In the neighborhood, you will find traditional Greek tavernas, a pharmacy, banks, and public transportation. For garbage disposal, there are small cans on the street corners and a green can for general garbage and blue ones for recycling at the end of Voulis st. and Kolokotroni st. Restaurant options include Tzitzikas & mermingas and Barbadimos, both located at 12-14 Mitropoleos st. For groceries, check out BAZAAR DISCOUNT MARKET at 28 Petraki st. or 45 Mitropoleos st. Alternatively, there are grocery stores at the corner of Nikis st. and Xenofontos st. or 5 Apollonos st.

name: Pinacota Junior Suite M2 - 35m2
description: Located on the mezzanine (access only by staircase) with internal back-yard view, this cozy and fully renovated suite offers a great solution for superb budget accommodation without lacking anything in terms of chic décor and quality furnishing. Each one with king size bed and a fully equipped kitchenette. This junior suite will make your stay in Athens an enjoyable experience.
neighborhood_overview:
Pinacota guests are positioned in the pulsing heart of Athens

Just 2km away from Kolonaki’s alluring shops, museums, galleries and eateries. Discover our elegant suites in the heart of the city -the perfect place to experience all that Athens has to offer.
Our guests benefit from support and undisturbed access to the public transport system (train, tram, metro, bus, taxi) and may easily get to the destination of their choosing.
Our suites are located right next to the historic Athenian park Pedion Areos , meaning Field of Ares, corresponding to the French Champ de Mars and the ancient Campus Martius , one of the largest public parks in Athens, Greece.

It is also the name of the wider neighbourhood.

The park was designed in 1934 and its purpose was to honour the heroes of the Greek Revolution of 1821, 21 of whom are depicted in marble busts standing in the park.

The park is a state-owned public ground, covering an area of 27.7 hecta
host_about:
We are a boutique hospitality group that owns and runs the Pinacota suites in Athens and the Psarou summer villas in Mykonos.   Psarou summer villas (PSV) opened summer 2012, the Pinacota suites Athens (PSA) opened July 2019,  we welcome you and we hope to stand up to your expectations.

Yiannis - Owner

name: Keramikos Comfortable Apartment #3
description:
Our modern apartment, meeting high standards, is set to give our guests the taste of the original Greek hospitality.
It is located on the first floor of an fully renovated building (during 2019).
It is ideal for couples , families, but also business trips.
Just 5 min walk from Keramikos metro station ( airport line).
Can sleep up to 4 guests.
neighborhood_overview:
The location of the house is unique for someone who is interested to visit on foot the "historical triangle" of the city. The longest pedestrian walk in Europe starts here. Taste the local cuisine, enjoy the outdoor cafes and bars located in the pedestrian of Gazi, visit galleries and the famous "Technopolis of Gazi" exhibition hall . Last but not least, Athens is known for its nightlife and the sub culture scene of bars and places to be that are off trip advisors.
We will help you discover the city and show you places where only low locals hang out. All those are reachable in a walking distance from the apartment.

Me and my team will be next to you for everything you need.

neighborhood_overview:
Kolonaki is a vivid area thanks to a well-balanced blend of Athenian connoisseurs who visit it for its vibrant city life and night scene. One of the city’s leading shopping areas, it boasts high-end boutiques, fine jewelry shops and contemporary art galleries. There are museums, art galleries and cultural venues to satisfy the needs and wants of enthusiastic travelers. Check out the Byzantine and Christian Museum, the Benaki Museum, the Archeological Musuem, the War Museum, the Museum of Cycladic Art and the EMST National Museum of Contemporary Art. Art enthusiasts will also adore the Greek National Gallery, the
Fine Arts & Music Foundation M&B Theocharaki and the Skoufa Art Gallery.

name: One Bldg – 4 Unique Apts – Green Rooftop! EP9 Bldg
description: 4 separate and unique apartments located in one building. They can also be rented separately. All apartments have access to a lovely, green roof top terrace and they are minutes walk away from Monastiraki square; the entrance to Plaka and all main sites!
neighborhood_overview: This apartment is located in Psirri, minutes walk away from Monastiraki and Plaka. Monastiraki station serves the Athens International airport and the port of Piraeus. Plaka is the heart of Athens historical city centre, where most main monuments are located. Psirri is a place where you still find lovely artisan shops such as candle making and leather work shops. It has great restaurants, cafes, art spaces and an outdoor cinema where you can enjoy films in the original language. You will also find grocery stores, bakeries and the Athens Central Food Market, the famous Varvakios Agora Walking around Psirri can be deceiving as it has many old buildings and lots of street art. The street art scene has produced many outstanding artists and their work is widely photographed and admired. The artisan shops, the residents who greet each other by their first names and the visitors create a place of unique character.
host_about:
We at Boutique Athens offer accommodation to travellers who are interested in the cultural and artistic pursuits on offer in our amazing city, Athens.
We own and manage several fully serviced, high quality apartments in the centre of the city.
We are interested in food, art, modern history and what is new and exciting.
We personally meet and greet our guests.
We provide full kitchens for cooking, a wonderful art collection and many books on Modern Greece.

name: Cute studio in the heart of Athens,  Kolonaki
description:
It is a spacious and full of light 50 square meter studio apartment on the 5th floor of a prestigious building, located in the heart of Athens, at a 3 minute walk distance from Syntagma metro station and Syntagma (Constitution) square.
It is an open plan studio (full living room and bedroom) with a small and well equipped kitchen (microwave oven and two burners, toaster, coffeemaker, kettle, washing machine), a bathroom with shower and a workplace desk. No balcony.
neighborhood_overview:
Super convenient location!
The house is located in the heart of Athens, a 3 minutes walk to central metro station called "Syntagma", in a beautiful and central area called Kolonaki, which is considered the aristocratic neighborhood of the city, with beautiful boutiques, cafes and dining places.
The house is located between two main squares of the centre of Athens: 5 minutes away from Kolonaki square and 3 minutes away from Syntagma square, which is considered the entrance of the historic centre. All the famous attractions of the city are at a walking distance: Mount Lycabettus, National Garden, Plaka, Monastiraki, Acropolis and the surrounding ancient ruins, as well as most of the important museums (Acropolis museum, Museum of Cycladic Art, Benaki museum, Byzantine museum).

name: Gardenia Grand Suite / The Koukaki Residence
description: This 1 bedroom, 2nd floor, tasteful apartment decorated in white Gardenia colors, in combination with wooden floor and stylish furnishing provides a relaxing and tasteful  atmosphere. Private marble bathroom, Microwave fully equipped kitchenette, refrigerator, cutlery, coffee maker, water kettle, toaster, hangers, Hairdryer, Iron and Ironing board, toiletries, towels, cotton linen  and extra pillows, smart flat-screen TVs,  A/C, heating. neighborhood_overview: At our vibrant and lovely neighborhood, you will find a large selection of restaurants and coffee shops, supermarkets and cultural spots. Very close to Acropolis Museum and Tourist sight-seen, just below the Philopappos hill, very closed to Piraeus and Flisvos Marina complex, Niarchos and Onassis cultural centers, is the best location choice, irrespective of the reason of visiting Athens
host_about: Part of the Modernism movement and Art Nouveau, The Koukaki Residence abounds in breath taking design elements that will definitely conquer your heart! From the monumental entrance, to the signature stairway which is a work of art of its own, all reflect the nobility of the Greek Bourgeois family who lived in this building at the beginning of the century. All the above encircle the Secret Garden in the middle, which is the Koukaki Residence's best kept secret.

name: [Bonni] - Cozy apartment in central Athens.
description: A cozy, fully renovated and fresh 45sqm, ground floor apartment, situated in the heart of Athens, within walking distance from the old city and the Acropolis. Accessible by all means of transport!
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in Neos Kosmos, a very central neighbourhood only a few minutes to the main attractions (Ex. Acropolis about 10 minutes walking) and well-connected with means of transportation. The neighbourhood is pretty quite, safe and full of traditional tavernas, bakeries, supermarkets, cafes and much more.

Apartment AK1 is minutes walk away from Omonia square and Omonia Red Metro Line station. Omonia is a bustling melting pot, a crazy mix of cultures, the absolute proof that this city never sleeps!
Plaka is located 15 minutes walk away and Acropolis 25 minutes walk away. Psirri, the renowned place with the best street art is 15 minutes walk away.

You will find various grocery stores, bakeries as well as the Athens Central Food Market (the famous Varvakios Agora) minutes walk away from our apartment.

The National Theatre of Greece, an architectural monument of note and still a working theatre is one block up from our apartment.

We own and manage several fully serviced, high quality apartments in the centre of the city.
We are interested in food, art, modern history and what is new and exciting.
We personally meet and greet our guests.
We provide full kitchens for cooking, a wonderful art collection and many books on Modern Greece.

name: Calm, comfy & close to Acropolis' Museum
description:
My calm, 90 sq.m. spacious apartment is located in the hip, central neighbourhood of Koukaki, in the Acropolis' area. It is just 15 min. walk to the Acropolis Museum, 20 min. to Plaka & 25 min. to Monastiraki. It is cool, originally artsy, quiet, and comfy in a mood of light shabby chic.
Sleeps up to 4 people in two separate bedrooms.
Bus stations, restaurants, bars & supermarkets are within a couple of minutes—10 min. walk to Fix Metro station.
neighborhood_overview:
Built in the '70's and typically inhabited by Athenians, the rather calm building is in the heart of Koukaki neighborhood, just a block away from the alive pedestrian of Olympiou street that offers plenty of bars, taverns, restaurants and nightlife until early morning.

Banks, bus-stations, several supermarkets and deli, bakery, drugstores, car/bike-rentals, small shops and the local fresh veggie and fruit street market (every Friday at Matrozou st.) are just a breath away.

You will enjoy living like a local and moving around to every must-see place of Athens in such a convenient way.
You may climb the Filopappou hill to watch Athens from the Acropolis heights in a 360 stunning view; you may visit the famous Herodou Atticou Theatre or be at Syntagma Square in less than 10 min. Everything that's interested is pretty accessible.
host_about: hi, i am Lia! Like travelling, art, music & dancing, reading, hanging out and many more! I think this is a great way to travel and find out about the place you are visiting from the  inside, so be my guest!

name: Stylish 2BR apartment next to Park ideal for group
description: Having 2 spacious bedrooms, a bathroom and a WC, a comfy living room connected to the kitchen as well as a corner balcony, Scylla & Charibdis apartment at Odyssey Residence is ideal for groups which want to enjoy each other’s company. The quotes from the legendary Greek poet that adorn the apartment’s walls will introduce you to the fantastic world of Preclassical Greek literature while the apartment’s stylish design will give a quick glimpse of life in present-day Athens.
neighborhood_overview: Kaisariani is a family-friendly neighborhood situated around a 30-minute walk from Syntagma square, Panathenaic Stadium and the Temple of Olympian Zeus. Away from the city center’s hustle and bustle, yet close to all main attractions, this quiet area is ideal from those aiming to get a proper taste of local life in Athens. Adjacent to Pagrati, an upcoming neighborhood with a vibrant nightlife, Kaisariani is surrounded by numerous restaurants, cafes and bars. The area’s trademark is Skopeftirio Grove, a 14-acre urban park painted with cobblestoned alleys, pine trees, firs and cypresses, ideal for a relaxing walk or an outdoor picnic. A shooting range during World War II,  the area was transformed into a park featuring playgrounds, an open-air cinema and a cozy cafe in 1984. A memorial built in honor of the victims of the German occupation stands in the heart of the park bearing testimony to the place’s historical significance.
host_about:
