name: Divine 1BR Apartment near the Acropolis museum
description:
Live in a freshly renovated modern apartment in the center of Athens and enjoy the magnificent Acropolis neighborhood. The new Museum of Acropolis, the entrance to the Parthenon and the buzzing neighborhood of Plaka are all just a few steps from the doorstep. A quiet, safe and strategically located location to explore Athens on foot. The apartment's freshly renovated spaces can comfortable accommodate 4 adults.
Nearest Underground Station: Acropoli - 3 min walk - 250m. Internet up to 50Mbps.
neighborhood_overview:
Acropolis is one of the most picturesque neighborhoods in Athens. The long pedestrian street passes in front of the Acropolis, Herodeion Theater, the New Acropolis Museum and finally reaches the Hadrian Arch. It is also known as Makrigianni quarter in Athens, where the statue of Makrigiannis lies, the hero of the Greek Revolution, that is found at the beginning of this street, in a small round square. Its architectural beauty and its historical significance, make this quarter popular among tourists and a favorite spot of the Athenians to stroll around on a Sunday morning, under the Holy Rock. It borders with the picturesque neighborhood of Plaka from one side and the region of Koukaki on the other.

The most famous sights in Athens are found within a walking distance from the Neighborhood. Museums include the new Acropolis Museum (2 minute walk from the apartment), the new Jewish Museum of Greece (6 min walk), the Museum of Greek Folk Art (6 min walk), an annex of which is t
host_about:
Hi! We are UPSTREET and we would like to welcome you to your new home away from home!

Combining our genuine love for Athens with our professional knowledge, we aim to offer you the best time during your accommodation.

Even if you are traveling for a few days or for a while, our freshly renovated apartments are in central and vibrant locations, ready to provide you with the most reliable services and amenities.

name: Kolonaki | Central Athens Philoxenia In Athens
description:
Hello and welcome to PHILOXENIA IN ATHENS | Kolonaki!
In the heart of central Athens, our 40m2studio apartment/flat is fully renovated and equipped and have been constructed with taste, love and care. It can accommodate maximum 4 persons.
10min away from Evangelismos Station, 13min from Syntagma Square and really close to all the must-visit sightseeings!
Our motto is “Where Simplicity Meets Hospitality” and expresses our desire and perception our guests to feel comfortable and relaxed like home.
neighborhood_overview:
Kolonaki, literally "Little Column", is a neighbor-hood in Central Athens, Greece. It is located on the southern slopes of Lycabettus hill. Its name derives from the two meter column (located in Kolonaki Square) that defined the area even before a single house had been built there.
Kolonaki is a wealthy and upmarket district. A place where you can do shopping with an aristocratic air, and with admittedly high pric-es. As one of the capital's leading shopping areas, it includes a number of high-end bou-tiques from young adult to casual fashion to prestigious haute couture from Greek and in-ternational designers. Here is where most ex-pensive fashion houses have their stores and it is a fitting location for their luxurious products. There are also a lot of Greek designers’ ateliers you can visit and pop up fashion stores. One of its main shopping streets, Voukourestiou Street, is now known for its jewelry.
Museums and galleries also abound in Kolonaki. The Benaki Museum, inside
host_about:
Hello and welcome to PHILOXENIA IN ATHENS!
Created in May 2019, Philoxenia In Athens is a project originated from an idea of 4 siblings, Dora, Rania, Maria & Yannis, and includes 4 apartments in different areas of Athens.
Glyfada | South Athens
Kolonaki | Central Athens
Petralona | Central Athens
Thissio | Downtown Athens
Our goal is to help visitors of Athens to find a place for short-stay with low cost and to give them the choice to select area or apartment style depending on their preferences and needs.
All apartments are fully renovated and equipped and have been constructed with taste, love and care. Their size is approximately 40m2 and can accommodate maximum 4 persons.
Our motto is “Where Simplicity Meets Hospitality” and expresses our desire and perception our guests to feel comfortable and relaxed like home.
We wish you a fantastic and memorable stay and we look forward to welcome you soon!

name: Acropolis Golden Suites | 4 by GHH
description: Acropolis Golden Suites Apartment is a part of a brand new building  (completed in 02/2020), located in the heart of Athens,  2 minutes away from the Acropolis museum and the Acropolis metro station and just a breath away from all the major archaeological sites everything by walking distance such as the "Plaka" area which is the most ancient part of the city, the Temple of Olympian Zeus, the Panathenaic Stadium and a lot more that you can explore by your self.
neighborhood_overview: Many museums are found nearby, the most important being the famous New Acropolis Museum, the Lalaounis Jewelry Museum and many other smaller museums located in the neighborhood of Plaka. Neoclassical buildings line the pedestrian street, that house many institutions, galleries or embassies. Many taverns, cafeterias, and gift shops are available.
host_about:
Find your own home in Greece, for holidays or any kind of travel via Golden Home Holidays!
The beauties of Greece invite you to enjoy the country's light, sea, history, culture, ambiance, hospitality... 
We are your new host. We take you beyond the narrow confines of a hotel and welcome you into a house that shall be your home, for as long as you wish -on beautiful Greek islands, in Athens and in numerous destinations worth visiting. We have secured high-quality accommodation and service facilities in luxury villas, select country houses as well as beautiful apartments for a dream holiday or a business trip tailored to your needs, aiming to make you feel at home. 
Visit museums and monuments that attract millions of visitors from all over the world. Delight in the renowned blue sky of Attica. Enjoy a short or longer trip to the wonderful islands or an excursion to the dozens of well-organized beaches and dreamy quiet coasts. Indulge in a dream cruise in the astonishing Aegean Sea. Stroll around plazas, shopping streets and historic quarters. Feel the beauty of simple pleasures in a typical Greek coffeehouse or local tavern. Savoir the theater, music and arts in a country known as the cradle of civilization, which has fostered culture through the centuries. Check out the numerous night entertainment options in a city that never sleeps!
We have created an alternative approach to holidays and to business travel, especially for those of you who love to combine the coziness of a home with your favorite amenities, without a strict schedule, but with special care. You deserve to enjoy unforgettable holidays, tailored to your own needs! You are free to travel for business in your own home in Greece!

description:
NEW – VERY CENTRAL – HELPFUL HOST
New, bright and completely renovated loft in every detail, extensively equipped and tastefully decorated. 7 min walk from the central SYNTAGMA metro station, 3 min from ERMOU the main shopping street, 5 min from PLAKA where are all ancient monuments and Acropolis are located. Plaka the old city of Athens, Acropolis and all archaeological sites are within 1,5 km so you can easy walk to everything.
host_about:
My name is Chris and I am 50 years old.
 
 I've spent most of my life in Athens, and I believe that it is a city that can always surprise you. 
 I love traveling, music, movies and learning about new cultures! 
 Through nocarz, I have managed to meet some great people and hear their own, unique, amazing stories! 
 
 I have also felt the need to provide my guests with my local knowledge and a handpicked selection of places that are worth a visit!
 Yet again there is always something new to discover in Athens .

 I love traveling, music, movies and learning about new cultures! 
 Through nocarz, I have managed to meet some great people and hear their own, unique, amazing stories! 
 
 I have also felt the need to provide my guests with my local knowledge and a handpicked selection of places that are worth a visit!
 Yet again there is always something new to discover in Athens .

name: Athens Urban Surfer's Acropolis view Penthouse
description: This penthouse apartment is on the top floor of the building and has a balcony with views to the Acropolis. host_about: Born and raised in Athens. This is where I went to school and college. I have a bachelor’s degree in Business administration and marketing from the American College of Greece. I've been working in the tourism industry since I was 17. Started as a water ski instructor during the summer at Spetses Island. Right now I’m working on a startup which also has to do with tourism. I always want to be able to use and develop my skills. I like meeting people from around the world by being their host. I love good food, reading books, watching movies, and going windsurfing. My dream is that with what I earn from my work, I will be able to travel all over the planet (or other planets).

name: Authentic Apartment in Plaka, 2 mins to Acropolis
description: Welcome to the Acropolis Memories in the most ancient & fascinating neighborhood in the western world! This one of a kind first floor apartment is a contemporary portrait of the classic Athenian architecture & design and living in it gives you an authentic experience of the Athenian & Greek sense of style, elegance & comfort. Right at the footstep of Acropolis & next door to the Acropolis museum & metro station, this amazing 3bedroom aprtm will be your favorite home away from home in Athens.
neighborhood_overview:
You are in the centre of all the sightseeing of Athens! At less than 500 meters around you will find the main attractions of Athens (Acropolis, the museum, Odeon of Herodes and much more)
But it is not only this, Plaka old classic and beautiful area under the hill of Acropolis is so close that you will not believe it. Nice and modern all day and night café bars, the designer’s shops with elegant and handmade souvenirs and fashion accessories
Enjoy its unique aura and energy of this special place on earth!
Everything is close like Kolonaki neighbourhood and Voukourestiou Street for shopping at the top fashion boutiques, dine in the high-end restaurants, and walk on Ermou Street, the open mall with hundredths of shops, and stroll down to Syntagma or Gazi area.
host_about:
We are thrilled to welcome you to one of our nocarz apartments in Athens, our goal is to ensure that you have a five-star experience in staying with us. 

We are part of a local fun and exciting hospitality group called MyGreekVacations managing more than 100+ beautifully designed custom-made apartments inspired by our travels and our stays in nocarzs around the world. The experience of meeting so many lovely people along the way is something we particularly enjoy, and the city of Athens is a hub where you can always find things to experience, see and do and we can’t get enough of it.

Our priority is to create a comfortable, relaxing and “home away from home” experience for our guests, a “workation” atmosphere for those who wish to combine business with leisure and to always be readily available and provide as much info and assistance as possible; all the things we value when traveling somewhere new ourselves.

Our home is your home! We treat our guests like lifelong friends and we love to spoil them during their visits.

We hope to see you soon.

name: cozy room close to the centre
description:
The apartment is shared and we provide you 1 private room. It is located in Gizi, a quiet neighborhood very close to the center of Athens. It is ideal for lone travelers , for Erasmus students and even for people who visit Athens for business.
Access to the center is really easy, on foot, or with means of transport. Supermarkets, groceries and restaurants are next to the house.
Sometimes in the year our small dog Sahir is in the apartment too.
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood, Gizi, is a quiet one. Working people live here, middle class, families. It is a safe neighborhood. Gizi is near the National Archeological Museum, near the Epigraphic Museum and others. There are three parks near the house, the one, Evelpidon Park, is a minute far, the second one is like 5 minutes from here and the other, Pedion tou Areos, one of the biggest parks in Athens, is 10 minutes from the house.
There is a square, Gizi square, 3 minutes walking distance, with cafes and Grills. There are also many supermarkets in the area, and bakeries, and ATMs really close to the apartment.

name: Stylish space, with an artsy Athenian feel
description:
Fast internet , A stylish space full of light, with a modern artsy feel and a lot of attention to design and details; the combination of old and new to pay full respect to the traditional Athenian interior design and energy.
A lovely terrace overlooking the downtown urban and hip area of Metaxourgeio.
Just in front of the National Gallery and a one minute walk from Avdi square and its wonderful bars, restaurants and galleries.
neighborhood_overview:
The building stands in downtown Athens, at the heart of the downtempo and almost communal neighborhood of Metaxourgeio, some 5 minutes walk from the metro station with the same name.
Located between Gazi with its famed nightlife and busy Omonia Sq., Metaxourgeio is a residential area that attracts many visitors. The neighborhood has acquired a reputation as an artistic and fashionable place due to the opening of many art galleries, theaters, trendy restaurants and cafes. Albeit being frequented by the hip youths of Athens, here you will find no posh or fancy clubs, but innumerable little raki places, where you can order meze to enjoy on the traditional tavern chairs set on the pavement; expect also to find hip little bars and some of the best street food corners and street art of the city. Moreover, the neighborhood gives visitors a budding sense of community that makes everything even more homey.
host_about: HI! My name is Noa. I live on a boat in the jaffa port, so I rent my house which i built all by myself with help from friends & family. I love to travel and mostly to do upcycle art. I love TLV, specially Jaffa. It has an expressional freedom & mix that I wish for everyone to experience. I’ve also fallen in love with Athens over the past years. Has a similar freedom. I split my time between both cities & design artsy apts for travelers visiting.

name: Boutique Hotel Near Acropolis | Ederlezi Allegra
description: Carefree, as her name suggests, Allegra is fond of light and joy. This 2nd floor, 27-sq. m. room is brimming with natural light from the balcony and wind from the ceiling fan, holding to Ederlezi Boutique Hotel’s standards by offering all the amenities, the stylish simplicity and the details you can expect from it.
neighborhood_overview: Ederlezi Boutique Hotel is located in 26 Lepeniotou Str. in Psyri, the artistic, vibrant & bohemian neighborhood in the heart of Athens, below the shadow of the Acropolis. It is reached easily by the Athens Railway “Thissio” station or the central and iconic Monastiraki Metro station. The area around it, the Historic Center of Athens, is the literal heart of the city’s rich nightlife, while also being exceptionally close to all major landmarks of the Greek capital.
host_about:
I am Vasilis, but my friends call me Bill. I am an entrepreneur and escape room designer by profession and choice! I have studied Economics & Accounting in Greece. I have worked for years in Management and Human Resources in Greece’s most premium restaurant chain, constantly interacting with people and learning from them! During the last years I was part of the team that created Great Escape Rooms. Great Escape Rooms is one of the first and most successful Escape Room companies in Greece, based in Athens, but with branches in other cities in Greece and Cyprus. I love meeting new people and interacting with them!
My choice in movies and literature is classic, with murder mysteries and crime fiction being my absolute favourite! I also enjoy period pieces and my guilty pleasure is pirate movies and Greek classic films of past decades. I also love playing board games!

I have great knowledge of Athens, the places to visit, eat and drink. Athens is not just its famous ancient monuments, or the modern and stylish nightlife spots. It is the small, under-the-radar corners of a city that give it its flavour, and Athens has many of them.

name: ★ Relaxing by the Acropolis Museum ★
description: Your vacation apartment in Athens is this urban, newly renovated flat. Cozy and functional, it is ideal for families with children and small companies or groups. It is located in the heart of  Koukaki  neighborhood, just 10' walk from Acropolis, Plaka and the historical city center of Athens.
neighborhood_overview:
Our apartment is located in Koukaki, Athens, Greece.
Koukaki, the neighborhood, is globally awarded as the 5th best place voted by the nocarz guests around the world! You can basically walk to all the ancient sites and historic center while still enjoying a quiet stay.

Here you will find a large variety of entertainment choices: restaurants, coffee shops and bars all strongly proposed by every local citizen in this area as they aren’t touristic but each one of them has it’s unique style and flavors. For your supply and personal needs, super markets and banks within a short walking distance. Additionally, our neighborhood is proud of its plenty alternative-artistic workshops with handmade and eco-friendly products in modern Greek style, instead of the old fashioned massive touristic shops.

Hot spots general info:
Acropolis, Filoppapos hill, Acropolis museum, MOMA museum are only few of the great hotspots that are 5min distance from our studio.
5min
host_about:

I 've also lived in Los Angeles, CA for 7 years where i studied and worked as a professional musician, as well as Stockholm, Sweden, which i love and still visit often. 
I 've travelled a lot for touring and pleasure, and I find that interacting with the locals is how you really get to know a place and discover life.
 I am looking forward to meeting you personally and share with you the secrets of my city.

Hello everyone! Welcome to My Greek Living, a co-brand of My Greek Vacations. We love travels, adventures and languages! Our team speaks 4 languages fluently! We're in love with Athens, the city where we grew up in.

Hello,

After years of travelling myself, from San Francisco to Lombok and from Ushuaia to Heimaey, I decided I wanted to host people myself.

Theo

host_about:
Find your own home in Greece, for holidays or any kind of travel via Golden Home Holidays!
The beauties of Greece invite you to enjoy the country's light, sea, history, culture, ambiance, hospitality... 
We are your new host. We take you beyond the narrow confines of a hotel and welcome you into a house that shall be your home, for as long as you wish -on beautiful Greek islands, in Athens and in numerous destinations worth visiting. We have secured high-quality accommodation and service facilities in luxury villas, select country houses as well as beautiful apartments for a dream holiday or a business trip tailored to your needs, aiming to make you feel at home. 
Visit museums and monuments that attract millions of visitors from all over the world. Delight in the renowned blue sky of Attica. Enjoy a short or longer trip to the wonderful islands or an excursion to the dozens of well-organized beaches and dreamy quiet coasts. Indulge in a dream cruise in the astonishing Aegean Sea. Stroll around plazas, shopping streets and historic quarters. Feel the beauty of simple pleasures in a typical Greek coffeehouse or local tavern. Savoir the theater, music and arts in a country known as the cradle of civilization, which has fostered culture through the centuries. Check out the numerous night entertainment options in a city that never sleeps!
We have created an alternative approach to holidays and to business travel, especially for those of you who love to combine the coziness of a home with your favorite amenities, without a strict schedule, but with special care. You deserve to enjoy unforgettable holidays, tailored to your own needs! You are free to travel for business in your own home in Greece!

description:
A modern and brand new 55 sq. meter studio located just a few meters from the most central and busy square of Athens. . Fast Internet, hot-tub and all kind of amenities that you may need for your stay in our city!
All the best restaurants and bars are located around the house and in a reach of a few minutes walking. Same applies for all the most important archaeological sites of Athens.
Can't find a better place to stay while in Athens for vacation or work!
neighborhood_overview:
There aren’t many places which showcase so perfectly the multi-layered mix of cultures which we call Greek civilization, like Monastiraki square. It is situated north of Plaka, the traditional neighborhood under the Acropolis, and right next to the busy junction of two central streets, Ermou and Athinas.
Where does Monastiraki name comes from?
The name ‘Monastiraki’, which means ‘small monastery’, refers to the orthodox monastery that occupied the square during the Ottoman times. The only remnant today is the church mentioned above and, of course, the tell-tale name of the neighborhood. The addition of the Mosque in the 18th century fueled the economic growth of the surrounding area, making the Monastiraki market a stable feature of the area up until today.

Despite the imposing historic buildings, the modern city still manages to shout its presence through the noise that comes from the busy shops and the people who crowd the square on a daily basis. Here you can fi
host_about:
Dreamin Athens is a company of Unique apartments in the heart of Athens but not only that. 
   We have hosted thousands of guests from all around the world since 2015 and we are committed to keep on doing our best, to help them experience the most hospitable homes and our unique Greek hospitality.
   We organize customized tours so they can experience all aspects of pleasures that Greece has to offer them, from ancient history and sites till the modern cuisine, nightlife, shopping and natural beauties. Feel free to ask any help or suggestions from our team that will love to enrich your trip with local secrets and advices that will make your stay unforgettable.
   We can also arrange your transportation from/to the airport/port or any other archeological sites so you can move around with no worries for anything else than your sun cream! 
   Trust us with everything that you want to include in your trip and not only and our team will strive only for the best!

neighborhood_overview: Plaka of Athens is a historic charming old-style neighborhood and a quite place to stay while visiting Athens capital. It is a few steps away from the busy city center and close to interesting neighborhoods such as Makrygianni, Acropolis, Syntagma, Thiseio, Kerameikos, Monastiraki and Psyrri. The most charming place of old town, Anafiotika neighborhood,  is in a couple meters distance away from our apartment. Acropolis museum is 4 min away on foot and the metro stop is only 3 min away. Plaka in general is far away from cars traffic, as cars are not allowed in the central, where marble paths and stairs can let you enjoy your excursion to the old town. There is a parking station next to our apartment where you can park your car safely upon payment. Also a few steps away you will find a mini market, a grocery store, restaurants, cafes, old churches, a bakery, laundry services, a cinema and several other tourist shops.

name: Ninas Athens Rooms: DAPHNE
description: The property is located in Monastiraki, just a 2-minute walk from the "Monastiraki" metro station! In this stunning, historic area, in the heart of Athens! Pole of attraction for Athenians, tourists and not only! The huge market, the sights categorize the area into one of the most beautiful areas of Athens. An area special but also special!
neighborhood_overview:
In the heart of the Athenian centre, Monastiraki is a unique blend of rhythms, eras and cultures, vibrant and always dynamic – yet steadily dedicated to commerce and the meeting of people. If we stand in the center of Monastiraki Square and make a 360-degree turn on the spot, we can see the history of Athens in just a few square meters. Recently renovated, the Square was paved with mosaic blocks of marble, stone and carved cast iron, symbolizing the “flows” and the diversity of the Mediterranean peoples.
The Tzistarakis Mosque (1759) was named after the Ottoman Voivode of the city Mustafa Aga Tzistarakis. It was also known as the Lower Fountain Mosque from the nearby fountain, which was fed by Eridanus. Its use as a handicraft museum begins after its first repair in 1915 and since 1975 it houses a remarkable collection of pottery from Greece, Cyprus, Ottoman and modern Turkey. Inside there is information and photos about the works and artists, but also the historical importance of

name: Ninas Athens Rooms: ERATO
description: The property is located in Monastiraki, just a 2-minute walk from the "Monastiraki" metro station! In this stunning, historic area, in the heart of Athens! Pole of attraction for Athenians, tourists and not only! The huge market, the sights categorize the area into one of the most beautiful areas of Athens. An area special but also special!
neighborhood_overview:
In the heart of the Athenian centre, Monastiraki is a unique blend of rhythms, eras and cultures, vibrant and always dynamic – yet steadily dedicated to commerce and the meeting of people. If we stand in the center of Monastiraki Square and make a 360-degree turn on the spot, we can see the history of Athens in just a few square meters. Recently renovated, the Square was paved with mosaic blocks of marble, stone and carved cast iron, symbolizing the “flows” and the diversity of the Mediterranean peoples.
The Tzistarakis Mosque (1759) was named after the Ottoman Voivode of the city Mustafa Aga Tzistarakis. It was also known as the Lower Fountain Mosque from the nearby fountain, which was fed by Eridanus. Its use as a handicraft museum begins after its first repair in 1915 and since 1975 it houses a remarkable collection of pottery from Greece, Cyprus, Ottoman and modern Turkey. Inside there is information and photos about the works and artists, but also the historical importance of

name: Remote workers' dreamhouse
description: An industrial space turned into a digital nomad’s paradise!  Split in 3 open space levels, with a ceiling as high as 10m , this urban space fills all your requirements. host_about:
A very warm welcome from me, Theoharis, the owner of Vilaman ΙΚΕ, the property management company that is running this property.
Having traveled extensively in the Americas, SE Asia and Europe, and being a demanding traveller myself, I adapted my experiences to my native Greece and combined them with our philoxenia: the ancient greek word that literally means a “friend to a stranger” and is synonymous to hospitality. 
For Greeks however, it is something deeper than that., it is an unspoken cultural law that shows generosity and courtesy to strangers. 
In addition, my personal relationship with each property owner allows me to make sure that everything runs smoothly, as desired, so that our every guest feels at home at our properties and takes a unique experience and unforgettable memories back home with them.

description: Recently renovated 34 sq.m. studio penthouse located on the last floor of a building. neighborhood_overview: A formerly low-profile neighborhood at the foot of the Acropolis, home to several service stations and body shops in the past, Koukaki has evolved over the last year in the hottest fun spot in the city, as new hangouts with an alternative character open one after the other. The tour begins from the “Bell Ray” (88, Falirou Str.), which is housed in an old service station that turned into an all-day industrial space, with large windows, tasty snacks, and lovely cocktails, where you’ll find it hard to get a table. The wine bar “Boheme Bourgeois” (36, Anastasiou Zinni Str.) prefers wines from the Greek vineyard, which come with cheeses and cold cuts. Right next door to it (34, A. Zinni Str.), you’ll find the “I Fabrika tou Efrosinou”, namely the factory of Efrosinos – the patron saint of cooks – with plenty of meze dishes and stews. At the “Monsieur Barbu” (59, Falirou Str.) and the “Hops” (10, Drakou Str.) nice, juicy burgers take centre stage, while the “Lotte” (2, Tsami Karatasou Str.)
host_about:
Find your own home in Greece, for holidays or any kind of travel via Golden Home Holidays!
The beauties of Greece invite you to enjoy the country's light, sea, history, culture, ambiance, hospitality... 
We are your new host. We take you beyond the narrow confines of a hotel and welcome you into a house that shall be your home, for as long as you wish -on beautiful Greek islands, in Athens and in numerous destinations worth visiting. We have secured high-quality accommodation and service facilities in luxury villas, select country houses as well as beautiful apartments for a dream holiday or a business trip tailored to your needs, aiming to make you feel at home. 
Visit museums and monuments that attract millions of visitors from all over the world. Delight in the renowned blue sky of Attica. Enjoy a short or longer trip to the wonderful islands or an excursion to the dozens of well-organized beaches and dreamy quiet coasts. Indulge in a dream cruise in the astonishing Aegean Sea. Stroll around plazas, shopping streets and historic quarters. Feel the beauty of simple pleasures in a typical Greek coffeehouse or local tavern. Savoir the theater, music and arts in a country known as the cradle of civilization, which has fostered culture through the centuries. Check out the numerous night entertainment options in a city that never sleeps!
We have created an alternative approach to holidays and to business travel, especially for those of you who love to combine the coziness of a home with your favorite amenities, without a strict schedule, but with special care. You deserve to enjoy unforgettable holidays, tailored to your own needs! You are free to travel for business in your own home in Greece!

Stefan

description: Experience stunning views of the Acropolis from this modern 2-bedroom apartment located right across the Acropolis Museum and metro station. neighborhood_overview:
**The Neighborhood**

Located in the vibrant and historical Makrigianni area, this apartment offers the ultimate cultural experience in Athens. Just steps away from the iconic Acropolis Museum and the Acropolis itself, you'll be immersed in the rich history of Ancient Greece. The famous pedestrian street, Dionysiou Areopagitou, is just around the corner, perfect for leisurely strolls with breathtaking views of ancient monuments. Surrounded by charming local cafes, restaurants, and traditional tavernas, you'll have plenty of options for dining and exploring authentic Greek cuisine.

In addition to its historical landmarks, the apartment is also surrounded by modern conveniences. The nearby metro station makes exploring the rest of Athens effortless, and the vibrant Plaka and Monastiraki neighborhoods are just a short walk away, offering unique shops, lively bars, and buzzing nightlife. For nature lovers, the Philopappos Hill is nearby, perfect for hiking and panorami
host_about: Welcome to our world of adventure & hospitality! We are a team of lively and diverse individuals who share a passion for connecting with people from all around the world. We offer exceptional accommodation to families, business travelers, and adventure lovers, with fully-furnished and expertly designed apartments, creating the perfect balance of Comfort & Style. Discover a world of vibrant energy, personalized care, and unforgettable experiences.

host_about:
I am Giannis, an entrepreneur and a coffee shop owner. I really like meeting new people from all over the world while travelling or, even better, having them visit Athens and hosting them! I am energetic and forward-thinking (or so my friends and colleagues say about me), a physical as well as intellectual person. I enjoy football and alternative sports, but also reading good books and of course activities like puzzles and escape rooms, things I do for a living!
I have travelled all over Europe and Africa and I consider Paris and Budapest my favourite destinations, places of history but also modern and cosmopolitan, having many things to see and do.
Films and TV shows about historic events and murder mysteries are my favorite and recently I got infatuated with Money Heist (“La casa de Papel”). while my literature of choice is mainly classic and timeless. I could not imagine myself as I am today without having read “Around the World in 80 Days” in my childhood!
I enjoy Mediterranean and Greek traditional cuisine, but I would like to taste every culinary tradition the world has to offer.
As for a life moto? “You can learn more for a person by playing with him/her for an hour than by a year-long conversation”, by Greek philosopher Plato.

description:
This is a fully renovated studio on the 4th floor, located very Centrally in Neos Kosmos and in close proximity to some of the most famous sights of Athens. The apartment can comfortably accommodate a couple, comes with a double bed, and is equipped with amenities such as Smart TV, Coffee Machine. Due to its location, it is the ideal starting point for you to get to know, Acropolis and all the historic tourist attractions of the city of Athens such as Plaka, Monastiraki, Thissio, etc. The metro station is located only a few meters away from the apartment, providing easy access to/from the airport and Piraeus port.

Neos Kosmos is an area that has gained significant traction during the last years due to its close proximity to Acropolis, Koukaki and Plaka areas. Further, the area is on the southern part of central Athens, thus the Athenian Riviera is also easily accessible. The apartment is next to the National Museum of Contemporary Art, a landmark for the City of Athens.

neighborhood_overview:
Psirri is the artistic, vibrant & bohemian neighborhood in the heart of Athens, below the shadow of the Acropolis. It is reached easily by the Athens Railway “Thissio” station or the central and iconic Monastiraki Metro station, right in Monastiraki.

The area around it, the Historic Center of Athens, is the literal heart of the city’s rich nightlife, while also being exceptionally close to all major landmarks of the Greek capital.
host_about:
I am Giannis, an entrepreneur and a coffee shop owner. I really like meeting new people from all over the world while travelling or, even better, having them visit Athens and hosting them! I am energetic and forward-thinking (or so my friends and colleagues say about me), a physical as well as intellectual person. I enjoy football and alternative sports, but also reading good books and of course activities like puzzles and escape rooms, things I do for a living!
I have travelled all over Europe and Africa and I consider Paris and Budapest my favourite destinations, places of history but also modern and cosmopolitan, having many things to see and do.
Films and TV shows about historic events and murder mysteries are my favorite and recently I got infatuated with Money Heist (“La casa de Papel”). while my literature of choice is mainly classic and timeless. I could not imagine myself as I am today without having read “Around the World in 80 Days” in my childhood!
I enjoy Mediterranean and Greek traditional cuisine, but I would like to taste every culinary tradition the world has to offer.
As for a life moto? “You can learn more for a person by playing with him/her for an hour than by a year-long conversation”, by Greek philosopher Plato.

name: (301) HiEndAccomodation-TopLocation
description:
W-ART luxury apartments is the perfect place for you to relax and have a wonderful time just a few minutes from the city center!
The recently renovated, fully furnished and equipped studios meet the needs of even the most demanding guest. Especially designed to offer a sense of comfort and elegance, they combine a charming simplicity with a variety of facilities.
*The views over the city and the Acropolis from the roof terrace are simply breathtaking.
neighborhood_overview:
Mets is without doubt one of Athens’ most picturesque neighborhoods! Situated less than 10min from Syntagma Square, is characterized by a balanced mix of neoclassical mansions, a touch of Bauhaus architecture and modern details.

*Within a short walking distance from the ancient Panathenaic Stadium, also known as Kallimarmaro, where the first modern Olympic Games were held. The views over the city and the Acropolis from the top benches are simply breathtaking. This will also give you the opportunity to explore the next-door park, where you can rest under the shades of trees for a quick break.

*Discover the quiet, yet upbeat district, taking a peaceful walk through the narrow streets, admiring the elegance of the old houses and discovering small glimpses of art around every corner, without missing the chance to enjoy a beverage or lunch at the various small cafes that have turned the neighborhood into a small European corner, with a view to the Acropolis.
host_about:
TopHouzzing’s story is simple yet exciting! We are Maria & Alex, the founders, both engineers. So we were already working together in the design & construction sector, so we  dealt with properties all the time. We are both into details, both love doing something right from scratch.

While we were traveling to new places and meeting old friends / making new ones, we felt what a rental should feel like, what it should offer guests like ourselves. Lots were missing, especially the simple little things that makes a visitor feel right at home -away from home. We then decided to start a rentals & real estate management company. It was July 2015 and we named it TopHouzzing Properties - the mission was simply to offer truly top accommodation to our guests. Starting then with a couple of our own properties, refurbished completely, we embarked on a great journey. 

Today the company manages close to 100 properties and growing steadily, mostly in Athens but also in mainland Greece and islands, flats, villas and so on. TopHouzzing  also offers consulting & real estate, design & construction and other professional services in its portfolio.

Hard work and our passion paid off. Our success is clearly stated not only in the many owners that trust us with their properties but even more in the hundreds 5-star reviews from guests from all over the world,  leading us to have a record of 14 consecutive quarters-since the company’s inception- SuperHost status on nocarz!

We take very good care of our guests and so do we with owners. You see, we both think as guests & owners ourselves. We are waiting anxiously to host you or to manage your property, in both cases you are in good hands with us.

name: Riankour Central 90sqm apt in Panormou
description: Our apartment is 91 sq meters and centrally located, 400 meters away from Panormou metro station that will get you within 10’ to Syntagma square, the Acropolis or Monastiraki. It is located on the third floor and ideal for couples or friends that prefer a quiet and relaxing apartment with everything you might need to ensure a pleasant stay. The flat can comfortably accommodate up to 4 people. There are a couple stairs to access the apartment.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood of Panormou is an authentic residential Athenian district. Around your apartment you will find within a few blocks a supermarket, bakeries, pharmacies, cafes, and places to eat plus any local shops that will cover your needs. Moreover, it has a plethora of bars, cafes and restaurants that make it one of the most popular destinations in Athenian nightlife scene. The area is serviced by two metro stations directly connected to the airport, those of Panormou and Ambelokipi which make the apartment the perfect getaway option to Acropolis and the historical city center. It’s also within walking distance from Kifisias avenue (400m) the main road artery that provides easy access towards the south and north districts. Finally, the area near the apartment becomes especially vibrant every Saturday morning with an open-air market nearby. You can find on that day market stalls with fresh vegetables, fruits, and fish from all around Greece.

name: Junior Suite with Terrace  by 33 Solonos Suites
description: Our Luxury Suite  can comfortably accommodate 2-4 guests. It features wooden floors and high hand-painted wooden ceilings throughout, a queen-sized bed with Egyptian cotton coverings facing a beautifully made burgundy marble fireplace, as well as a sitting area. In a separate area, guests can enjoy their private dining area, fully equipped with a kitchenette, which overlooks the semi-private patio.
neighborhood_overview:
33 Solonos Suites is perfectly located in the heart of Athens, the affluent and upbeat Kolonaki, right between Syntagma Square and the Parliament Building, walking distance from a plethora of shops (both the high street and luxury boutiques).

The Suites are located:
8-minute walk from Syntagma square, where you can see the Greek Parliament, Tomb of the Unknown Soldier, and also find restaurants, bars, and retail shops. You can marvel at the beautiful buildings nearby, such as the University of Athens, the Neoclassical buildings and and many others.

15-minute walk from the bustling Monastiraki area, the famous Flea Market, key archeological sites (such as the Ancient Greek Agora, the remains of the Roman Agora, Hadrian’s Arch, among others). A few moments away is Plaka, Athens’ old town with its narrow-cobbled streets, for an al fresco lunch under the Greek sun.

20-minute walk from the Acropolis, to marvel at Greece’s iconic site and visit the Acrop
host_about:
We are Bill & John two young entrepreneurs with family ties. We were both born in Athens and continue living in this fascinating city. We have both spent our early years in the tourism and hospitality industry assisting our family in its hotel and tour operator ventures. Bill holds a bachelor in Hospitality Management & International Tourism and John holds a bachelor in Marketing & Communication. 
We are committed to greeting our guests with large measures of Hellenic Filoxenia! 
We both love traveling and discovering new cultures.

description: Wukela Apartments is located in the heart of Athens with an open view and good location, beautiful panoramic view of the Acropolis from the balcony where you live.When the sun sets off with a cup of coffee, it won't be wonderful.A few minutes walk downstairs is the famous Mona Stilach Flea Market in Athens.Athens Municipal Art Gallery and the Greek National Theatre are a ten-minute walk away, with convenient transportation, and a 5-minute walk from the Chengtie Station.
host_about: Wukela Apartments 地处雅典市中心，有着开阔的视野和良好的环境位置，站在你所居住的阳台可以看到美丽的卫城全景。当夕阳缓缓落下配上一杯咖啡是在美妙不过了。楼下走路几分钟就是雅典有名的蒙纳斯提拉奇跳蚤市场。雅典市政艺术画廊和希腊国家剧院走路十分钟就可以到达，交通便利，距离城铁站走路5分钟路程。Wukela Apartments 整体都是希腊本土大理石豪华装修，干净整洁。简约大方，客房内配有私人浴室，中央空调，卫星电视，免费WIFI ,还有可以提供简餐的温馨小厨房，咖啡机，面包机厨具全套配备。让您在游览疲惫之余也能感受到家的温馨。比雷埃弗斯码头，海滩，浏览坐城铁公交车30分钟都可以很快到达，距离雅典国际机场20公里。让你出行不担心。

name: Twin With Acropolis View | Pella Inn
description:
The only Hostel in Athens, where antiquity, modernity, comfort and value all meets in the best location in the city of Athens with the best view of the Acropolis. The rooftop has a direct view of the Acropolis and is perfect for chilling out, having a good time and meeting other travelers.

Room with view at Acropolis!

Only 10 minutes to Acropolis on foot!
Only 5 minutes to Monastiraki metro station on foot!

Free Internet,
Reception Is Open 24/24 (No Curfew),
Lockers etc
host_about: Pella Inn is situated in the heart of the old town of Athens within walking distance from the famous Acropolis, Monastiraki square and Plaka. The rooms and their balconies have a direct view of the Acropolis, as does the rooftop bar, which is perfect for chilling out, having a good time and meeting other travelers while enjoying the amazing view of the Acropolis and the rest of the city. The nearest metro station, Monastiraki, is only 150 meters away providing easy access to and from the airport, as well as a direct line to the port of Piraeus. The excellent location of Pella Inn gives you immediate access to all the interesting sights of Athens such as the Acropolis, the Ancient Agora, Keramikos, the Olympic Stadium, the National Archaeological Museum, etc. Our friendly staff is always prepared to advise you on how to get around the city, from the tourist sites to places 'off the beaten path'.

neighborhood_overview:
*See the city by walking! (Acropolis and Plaka within 10 min walk)
Koukaki is a top residential area in Athens because of its proximity to the Acropolis,
nightlife, neighborhood eateries, and bars. It is both casual and stimulating.
Bakeries, late night food options, pedestrian streets and museums are all close!
Koukaki sits at the foot of Filopapou Hill, a natural park in the middle of the city,
offering ample walking paths and memorable views. Take a walk where locals go to
walk their dogs and watch the sunset.
*Close to pharmacies, Bio shops, grocery stores, cáfes, & restaurants
*There is an amazing farmers market every friday in the area with local produce.
* Koukaki has been voted in the top5 best area's for nocarz.

name: Acropolis SkyVilla  - 7 bdrm - Views! Terrace!
description: When traveling with a larger group, it can be tough to find the right place to stay. If your family or group is looking for a spacious, centrally located apartment – but one with that all-important 5-star feel – look no further than our Acropolis View Sky Villa.  One private property with 7 bedrooms, 6 baths and space for the whole group the dine, relax and gather!
neighborhood_overview:
Wondering what our Athens neighborhood is like & if you can walk to the Acropolis?
You can! It's a 15 - 20 minute walk (or 30 minutes if you get distracted by one of the 4 bakeries you'll pass along the way!), through the National Gardens or past Hadrian's Arch.
Stay local for dining and shopping though, our Pagrati neighborhood gives you the perfect mix of local tavernas and hip cafes & brunch spots.
We've got three supermarkets, twice weekly farmers markets and two many tasty tavernas and chill cafes to mention here.
host_about:
Who would have thought when I boarded a plane for Greece more than 20 years ago, planning on backpacking through the mountains and then heading north through then Yugoslavia I'd end up making Greece my second home?
But here I am, 20 something years later, with our fabulous biz "Greek Vacation Rentals",  opening up our amazing Acropolis view family & group friendly Athens apartments & our MagicFactoryLofts, spacious art filled homes in Chicago, while planning RealGreece travel itineraries and leading small group food & wine focused tours around my adopted homeland and loving the life that I am lucky enough to be living. Of course I did pick up an equally crazy, workaholic Greek husband along the way, as well as a stray Greek animal or two!

Update: January 2023 .... This year Basil and I celebrate 20 years opening our Greek vacation rentals to guests from around the world. All these years we've been hopping between Basil's home city, Athens and Carole's home city of Chicago.  Time and time again guests in Greece asked us if they can stay in our Chicago home while we're in Athens.... so now you can stay in Chicago in our art filled Magic Factory Lofts. We've got 3 and 4 bedroom homes in the heart of the city with Big Shoulders -  in our hybrid warehouse (which in a previous life housed a bar and a dance hall, followed by a costume and magic card factory and then a photography studio where probably every Butterball turkey advertisement in the 1980s was shot .... the photos, not the turkeys!)

So come stay with us ... and then stay with us again. Whether you'd like to enjoy an ouzo in Athens overlooking the Acropolis the Acropolis View Alpha or 7 bedroom  Acropolis SkyVilla, or a beer and a hot dog in Chicago while staying at  our Magic Factory Lofts  we know that you won't be disappointed. 

All of our places are perfect for 3 generation families, multiple couples (especially in Athens pre or post cruise), or groups of friends on a city break or vacation.

name: The Acropolis Viewer – For Time Travelers!
description:
Located at the foot of the Acropolis, just above Emperor Hadrian’s famous Library, a step away from Plaka and the Ancient Agora, our specially designed apartment, filled with antique Greek furniture and craftwork, offers breathtaking views of the Parthenon.
This is the oldest and most vibrant district of Athens, the perfect spot for shopping, dining and sightseeing. All the archaeological sites are within walking distance.
Only one minute walk from Monastiraki Metro Station.
neighborhood_overview:
Situated on the north side of the Acropolis, picturesque Monastiraki is one of the most popular shopping areas in Athens. You are in the heart of the city. Traditional tavernas, distinguished restaurants, charming cafés are all on your doorstep. It's the ideal starting point for discovering Athens' iconic landmarks.
Top places to explore nearby:
• The Acropolis.
• The Ancient Agora.
• The Roman Agora.
• Plaka, known as “the neighborhood of the gods”.
• Thissio, with its enchanting promenade under the shadow of the Acropolis.
• Monastiraki’s Flea market.
• Ermou street, Syntagma Square and the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier.

neighborhood_overview:
Our apartment is located in Syntagma, the heart of Athens. In just few steps you will find yourself wondering around the beautiful and famous alleys of Plaka.

Syntagma square - Plaka - New Acropolis Museum 
 
Being on Syntagma square you can easily enter the area of Plaka which is the oldest and most prestigious neighbourhood of Athens. Attached to the Holy Rock of Acropolis it’s a “must-see” area for every visitor setting foot in Athens. It’s unique, it’s picturesque, full of labyrinthine alleys. It’s like a journey to the past. Don’t miss the chance to stroll around “Anafiotika” , a cosy district of Plaka that looks like a small island popped from the north slope of Acropolis. Plaka’s main pedestrian - only Kidathinaion and Adrianou you can find plenty of stores selling traditional goods, souvenirs, folk artifacts and Greek traditional food products. At Plaka’s alleys you will come along many traditional Athenian taverns (see more to TASTE), museums (see more to

description: Pallineon house is newly renovated Apartment Hotel, situated at the picturesque neighborhood of Ano Petralona. Petralona is a centrally placed charming neighborhood, right next to the heart of the City, vibrant and colorful has kept it's authentic identity of an old Athenian neighborhood. Famous among locals for it's beautiful cafes and it's traditional establishments, serving home style Greek and fusion dishes. This establishment is ideal for family accommodation.
neighborhood_overview:
Petralona is a centrally placed charming neighborhood, right next to the heart of the City.
Vibrant and colorful has kept it's authentic identity of an old Athenian neighborhood. Famous among locals for it's beautiful cafes and it's traditional establishments, serving home style Greek and fusion dishes. Pallineon House is located just 350m. from Petralona metro station (line1), offering direct connection with the port of Pireaus, which is terminal station to metro line 1. PaLlineon House is 1km. away from archaeological site of Kerameikos, just 850m. from the vivid Gazi Technopolis and only 1,3km. from Filopappou Hill. Popular points of interest at short distance include Acropolis Museum, Odeon of Herodes Atticus and the archaeological site of Acropolis Citadel. The closest airport is Athens international airport, Eleftherios Venizelos, 21km. from Pallineon House.

Our apartment is located in Syntagma, the heart of Athens. In just few steps you will find yourself wondering around the beautiful and famous alleys of Plaka.

Syntagma square - Plaka - New Acropolis Museum 
 
Being on Syntagma square you can easily enter the area of Plaka which is the oldest and most prestigious neighbourhood of Athens. Attached to the Holy Rock of Acropolis it’s a “must-see” area for every visitor setting foot in Athens. It’s unique, it’s picturesque, full of labyrinthine alleys. It’s like a journey to the past. Don’t miss the chance to stroll around “Anafiotika” , a cosy district of Plaka that looks like a small island popped from the north slope of Acropolis. Plaka’s main pedestrian - only Kidathinaion and Adrianou you can find plenty of stores selling traditional goods, souvenirs, folk artifacts and Greek traditional food products. name: Athens Lux Casa, Urban Eco Suite Queen & Sofa Bed
description: Enjoy Athens at its best! Located in the heart of the historical center, you are within walking distance from most cultural & historical landmarks (including the Parthenon), as well as famous shops & award-winning downtown bars & restaurants. Our new, elegant, eco-conscious, urban studio design balances luxury with comfort. After a day out on the town, the luxury shower, awarded-winning Coco-mat superior quality bed system & linens, & fully equipped kitchen, await you for a calm & relaxed rest.
neighborhood_overview:
Τhe Athens Lux Casa is located on Kolokotroni street (n.60) named after Theodoros Kolokotronis (the pre-eminent leader of the Greek War of Independence (1821–1829) who lived there).
It is one of the most loved streets for all Athenians since it combines a wide variety of shopping choices from vintage to modern, a wealth of quality restaurants, historical buildings, and some of the oldest and most iconic bars in the city — blending the old and new, the classical and the alternative. The Monastiraki area, located just around the corner, provides more shopping, bars, and restaurants overlooking ancient ruins, monuments and 10th-century churches, and maze-like pathways at the base of the Acropolis. From the up-scale Kolonaki to the village-like Plaka, everything is close by for you to discover & enjoy. We want your visit to be the best, and are available to provide any recommendations and assistance you may need during your stay. We look forward to seeing you!

name: Cozy central 2BDR apt FREE parking close to metro
description:
Refurbished 2Bedroom apartment on the 3rd floor of an apartment building in Ambelokipi with spacious sitting dinning area and fully equipped kitchen. Features:
Two separate bedrooms (1 with Double bed & 1 with two Single beds)
One full bathroom with bathtub and a WC.
Air-condition covers the areas of sitting dinning and kitchen areas.
Bedrooms have ceiling fans with remote control.
Large closets in both bedrooms.
Parking with gate that locks (car length up to 4,30m)
Elevator
neighborhood_overview:
Ampelokipi is an urban district in Athens right outside of the city center ring that prohibits cars to enter without permission which is very convenient for those who have their own car.
They can always use the metro to go the center, like Syntagma Sq. Acropolis and a lot of others popular destination in Athens.
There are two major metro stations nearby, Panormou Station (450 m approx away) and Ampelokipi Station at the opposite direction (450 m away approx).
The nearest pharmacy is just around the corner (30m away)
Dentist at 50 m away
Nearest big supermarket (Masoutis) at 150 m
Major hospitals of Athens within 3km radius
Several traditional taverns within walking distance (500 m radius)
Along Kifissias avenue which is at 400 m away, a lot of shops to buy goods or souvenirs can be found.

name: Ceramian 4.1
description: Overlooking a quiet pedestrian street, this unique design apartment provides a visiting experience of seclusion and tranquility, while boasting a central location in Athens historical center, with most important landmarks within walking distance. Filled with natural sunlight, its big terrace offers unobstructed Acropolis views. High-end design furniture are matched with handmade objects and natural materials in an earthy palette.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the heart of Kerameikos, an area overflowing with history. Kerameikos took its name from the word kéramos ("pottery clay", from which the English word "ceramic" is derived), because of the many ceramists who lived and worked there in ancient times.

In this sacred area between the Parthenon and Dēmósion Sēma, our guests are bound to submerge themselves in the lavish ancient Greek history.

But Kerameikos of nowadays has much more to offer. Some of Athens most exquisite restaurants are located steps away. Bars, caffes, museums, art galleries, local markets set the scene of a vibrant, lively, edgy and interesting place to live.

Combining the allure of an unspoiled, old-fashioned, original neighborhood with its central location, our unique design apartment makes the perfect starting point to discover and experience Athens.

Although the area has its own eclectic mix of cafes, restaurants and bars, it is only 13 m. walk from Plaka with its multiple small cafes and traditional tavernas. neighborhood_overview:
Psiri is the most vibrant and interesting area in Athens.

The neighbourhood is really vibrant with plenty of restaurants, bars, cafes that are located all around the area and within walking distance from the flat. Grocery stores, bakeries, supermarkets and all other necessary amenities are only a breath away.

Psiri is based in Athens' Historical Centre and you will have the chance to see and explore everything that has made Greece famous, from the Acropolis museum to Greek traditional tavernas or wonderful local bars that spread the area's vibe. This is also one of the safest areas, so you can walk around with your friends or your family safe.

The area offers really good connections with the airport, the port and the city centre with all available public transport options (metro, tram, buses).

Bordering the areas of Neos Cosmos and Koukaki – two historic neighbourhoods with plenty of drinking and dining options, Kallirrois 89 Suites is perfectly positioned for capturing Athens’ vibes.
Voted by nocarz users among the top 5 must-visit neighbourhoods in Athens, Koukaki’s pedestrianised streets are just a short stroll away from your doorstep – and they come with a comprehensive array of traditional Greek tapas restaurants, souvlaki joints but also sophisticated dining places and lively wine and cocktail bars. With hipster spots and more authentic options at hand, you may take your pick as your mood strikes. The Acropolis and all the main attractions, such as Plaka and Thiseio, are within walking distance too, while the quaint neighbourhood of Mets and the Temple of Olympian Zeus is also easily accessed on foot.

name: Downtown Athens flat - sleeps 4
description: This modern 4-person apartment is located on the edge of the Academias - Exarcia district in downtown Athens, a 10-minute walk from the Acropolis and all museums. The apartment has a stylish living room, fully equipped kitchen, two bedrooms, and a modern bathroom with towels and linens provided. neighborhood_overview:
Exarchia is a vibrant and historically significant neighborhood located in the heart of Athens, Greece. Known for its alternative and rebellious spirit, Exarchia has gained a reputation as a hub for activism, counterculture, and artistic expression.

The neighborhood's history dates back to the late 19th century when it was primarily a working-class area. Over the years, it has attracted a diverse mix of residents, including intellectuals, students, artists, and political activists. Exarchia played a crucial role in the resistance against the military junta in the 1970s, and its rebellious character has persisted ever since.

One of the defining features of Exarchia is its strong anarchist presence. The neighborhood is home to several squats, autonomous spaces, and social centers that serve as gathering points for activists and grassroots movements. name: #AH11 Blue studio
description: 24 m2 1st floor studio with double bed, kitchenette, breakfast table, small balcony, perfect for 1–2 people.
neighborhood_overview:
This 24 m2 studio is on the 1st floor of a purpose designed apartment building with small flats. It is located on Mavromichali Street, near Alexandras avenue in the Neapolis district of downtown Athens.
A typical Athenian residential neighborhood, where everything can be found within a few minutes' range from the property: Super market is at 2 min walk, on the same street, as well as 2 small traditional Greek tavernas.

At 5 min walking distance, οn Kallidromiou street, guests can visit the weekly Saturday street food market (laiki), one of the best in Athens, selling fresh fruit & vegetables, as well as a variety of local food products, sold directly from the producers and farmers.

In the summer, there are 2 open-air cinemas in the neighborhood at 2-3 min walking distance.
host_about:
I run a Short term Rentals' agency since 2007 and I've learned a lot all these years, from experiences, as well as mistakes! 

We specialize in all-inclusive rentals of high-quality apartments and houses in Greece, for a stylish, personalized hotel alternative.

I enjoy carefully selecting furnished, equipped apartments & studios, intended for a short city break or for a longer corporate stay in the very heart of Athens.
I also take pride in hand-picking unique traditional Cycladic residences, ideal for experiencing the simplicity of a genuine home in a small island, like Sifnos.

Bottom line: I love my job! I hope you'll love our properties too :-)

name: Muazzo Plaka Upper Home, Views to Acropolis
description: Be whisked off your feet and into a world of authenticity and historic elements surrounding you. The unique home is located in the heart of Plaka, the oldest district in Athens which lies proudly in the shadow of the Holy Rock of the Acropolis.
neighborhood_overview:
Location Overview :
The Location
Plaka, the oldest district of Athens, lies in the shadow of the Holy Rock of the Acropolis Τhe scattered ancient remains between the picturesque houses testify to the long, glorious history of the city. Walking in the narrow alleys of Plaka one encounters ancient Greek monuments, Roman constructions, small Byzantine churches and buildings of the Ottoman era. Considered as the neighborhood of the gods, Plaka evoke the Athens of the last 200 years with his small houses and restored neoclassical buildings. Although without cars, the streets are full of life, filled with numerous tavernas, colorful small shops and romantic bars. Τhis cultural mosaic includes the Flee Market of Athens and numerus open air activities. Thrasyvoulou Street is one of the most characteristic streets of Plaka, under the rock of the Acropolis. Muazzo Plaka location is uniques as it is just a few steps away from one of the most picturesque taverns in the area (Klepsidra
host_about:
ThinkVilla Bespoke Stays, is a Luxury Villa Rental Agency which was launched back in 2009, featuring a collection of 300+ Inspiring Retreats, for the Independently Minded. Our Curated Private Villas are in the most Iconic Greek Destinations (Crete, Santorini, Zakynthos, Rhodes, Skiathos), where each ThinkVilla Escape blends comfort & awe in equal measure. 

ThinkVilla Team believes that surpassing expectation knows no bounds. Independent Minds who transform any stay from “so-so” to superb. We are a team of Hospitality Professionals (Nikki, George, Despina, Marianna, Nikos, Alexandros, Elia, Stelios) who together with our Managing Director - Maria Gkonta and our ThinkVilla CEO & Founder - Valia Kokkinou share the same passion : building, detail by detail, amazing holiday experiences for our guests all over Greece. Our dream team of on-the-ground experts is on hand 24/7 to ensure you book a better experience than you had in mind. With studies in Swiss Glion Hospitality Management, and extensive experience in Leading Hotels of World, Kempinski & Marriott Hotels, we are bold trailblazers, rule-breakers, and creative visionaries who bring our own sense of style and unique personalities to each and every villa.

Our ThinkVilla brand reflects who we are at our core. Our standards for conscious travel, formalise our commitment as a business to sustainability. We embrace the distinctive, celebrate the unconventional and champion the one-of-a-kind. Seeking out Villas and experiences that have individual character, creativity and place our travellers at the heart of an environment. We are committed to creating a valuable community with a powerful collective influence. We promote cultural-environmental sensitivity, encouraging travellers to explore Greece with intention.

Small wonders await you, escape to a place where togetherness comes first. For the solitary travellers, the romantics and the families, and for all those seeking out the antidote to the everyday, your journey starts here. Enhance your stay with our Premium Family oriented service offering, designed with our youngest guests in mind. 

We are looking forward to welcoming you soon in Greece!

*Please note that ThinkVilla is acting solely as a Booking Agent in the name & on behalf of the Property Owner, for the rental of the property.

neighborhood_overview: Mets is a small neighborhood, a heartbeat from all the main touristic attractions of the city center(it is a 10 minutes walk from Acropolis and just 5 minutes from Kallimarmaro Stadium)but it is not touristic at all. It is located on Ardittos hill. A little bit of Montmartre, a little bit of East London, this is a place you should discover if you want to visit one of the most charming areas of Athens. Mets took its name from the beer house that was established on the hill in 1870 by the Bavarians who accompanied King Otto to Greece. In the 19th century, due to the area's proximity to the Palace and the city center, the neighborhood was populated by middle-class families who built elegant, big neoclassical houses and changed the character of the area completely. It is now considered one of the most stylish neighborhoods of the city. Many artists, musicians, actors, painters have moved in Mets and have given it a more bohemian character. A handful of shops, cafes, bars and restaurants in
host_about:
Our company  Ma Maison Y&R owns seven luxury apartments in Athens.
We are Yannis and Rena, "fellow travelers" for the last twenty years. In 2016 we decided to do something that we love very much, through nocarz. 
The Greek word "ΦΙΛΟΞΕΝΙΑ=hospitality" is of a particular importance in the Greek culture. It’s a compound word from "ΦΙΛΩ=LOVE" and "ΞΕΝΟΣ=GUEST " and refers to the act of nestling and caring of a guest by the host. It was an institution for the ancient Greeks to welcome and take care of the guests at their home. They believed particularly in the idea of hospitality and regarded it as a moral duty and a sacred rule of the gods (Xenios Zeus was the protector of the guests). They offered them bath and sleep and they greeted them with gifts. The host and the guest were linked with friendly ties, which where inherited to their descendants. 
This is our inheritance.
It will be an honor to host you.

description: Discover the perfect blend of privacy and community in our inviting apartment on Olenou Street, Polygono. This cozy retreat, situated on the 2nd floor, features three private rooms, each with its own private balcony, alongside shared spaces including a bathroom, kitchen, and a welcoming living room. Olenou Haven is your key to a tranquil and communal Athenian experience.
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Olenou 6-8, nestled in the beating heart of Polygono. This isn't just an apartment; it's your gateway to the authentic Athenian experience. Our cozy haven on the 2nd floor invites you into the soul of the city, where history meets modernity, and every corner tells a story.

• Polygono Magic: Step outside, and you're in the midst of Polygono's vibrant tapestry. Explore charming alleyways, adorned with street art and the aroma of local delicacies wafting from neighborhood tavernas.

• Your Private Balcony: Your room comes with its own private balcony – a slice of Athenian heaven just for you. Sip your morning Greek coffee as the city awakens or savor an evening breeze under a star-lit sky. It's your personal retreat above the lively streets.

• Shared Living, Shared Stories: Our shared spaces are more than rooms; they're places to connect. The communal living room is where tales are swapped, and friendships blossom. It's a genuine taste of Athenia

In a charming neighborhood with wonderful restaurants and shops, Athena apartment is placed in a strategic position to reach easily and quickly all the most attractive places of the city of Athens.

neighborhood_overview:
Koukaki is the most famous and lively neighborhood of Athens. On the one hand the distance from Acropolis and historic center is almost few meters , on the other hand there are many shops, restaurants,cafes,supermarkets,farmacies and shops for anything you need. Many of these shops have the best reviews for brunch, coffee, food.

You can visit all the major sights of Athens (Acropolis, Monastiraki, Thiseio, Kerameikos and many more…) in a walking distance or by using the metro station of Syggrou Fix which 4 minutes form the apartment.
host_about:

Come, and Live as a Greek !

name: The HostMaster Civic Modern Apartment
description: This cozy, modern and completely renovated apartment will attract you with its special and playful character. The comfortable sofa in the living room, the deep green sweat armchairs, and also the spacious bed will welcome you to a relaxing aura. Even though it is close to Pagrati city this complex combines the carefreeness beneath the civic Athenian vibe!
neighborhood_overview: The house is located very close to the center of Pagrati just a stone's throw from bars, restaurants, cafes, and brunches that are busy the whole day. Also, we highly recommend walking through the Alsos Pagratiou, a great park in the center of the Pagrati area. But if you prefer to explore the green part of Athens, you can reach Syntagma in thirty minutes on foot. Walk through the Presidential Palace and from the National Garden, to Herodou Attikou which ends in the famous and cosmopolitan Kolonaki. In case you are in a hurry or not in the mood for walking, you can take a bus from the nearest bus stop which is 3 minutes away on Nikiforidi Street.
host_about: The HostMaster is a property management company that looks after a bright and diverse portfolio of properties in Athens! We are committed to offering the best stay to each and every one of our guests. We provide some unique services that most of the other hosts cannot provide. name: No13-3 Theo Homeybee Victoria
description:
Hello Homey!

Cute and comfortable 1st floor private room in a five room apartment, next to Victoria Square, in the center of Athens and only 5 minutes away from Agios Georgios Square, a popular hang out spot. Being close to public transport stations (metro, buses, railway) but within walking distance of a variety of historical landmarks and must-see sites in the city, it offers an ideal accommodation for solo travelers and couples in love!
neighborhood_overview:
Charming and colorful neighborhood in the heart of Athens. Patision Street is one of the streets that were laid out in such a way that as you move towards the historical center you always have the Parthenon in your field of vision! It is the road where all public transport runs to and from the historic center with many shops! Directly opposite Patision Street begins the neighborhood of Kypseli.
"Kypseli" in Greek means beehive and the reasons for its name can easily be justified through a short walk through its colorful and charming streets, inhabited by people from countries and nationalities from all over the world. Multicultural and bohemian in its own special way, Kypseli is a wonderful area to explore, with a variety of cafes, restaurants and cultural meeting points. The financial University is very close for students, the Pedion Areos Park near the apartment and the pedestrian street of Fokionos Negri are also great options for your morning walks or even workouts - in ca
host_about:
Hello, I'm Theo.
  I live in the neighborhood of Exarcheia and I deal exclusively with the short-term rental of my privately owned apartments, so I have the opportunity to have discreet but direct contact with my guests and I will be very happy to help your smooth stay in Athens.
  I live very close to all my apartments and, as I am fully committed to the convenience and care of my guests' accommodation, I am always happy to meet new people and share local tips and "inside information" of the city.

  During the summer, I am also happy to have my guests at home for coffee or a drink - my house has a wonderful terrace with stunning views of Lycabettus, the Parthenon and the cityscape of Athens.  You'll love it!  In any other case, you will probably meet  coffee of the Exarcheion say hello and have a raki with me!

  We hope to see you soon!

name: Downtown mediterranean loft.
description:
Inspired by the rustic style and relaxed vibe of the greek islands this house reflects the welcoming spirit of the mediterranean hospitality!
It is located in Exarcheia, one of the most bohemian and artistic neighborhoods, which makes you feel like you're home with the most art and culture centers.
It is a perfect place for artists or for people who are looking for some inspiration!
It is close to many important sights, galleries and monuments. Metro station is only 5 minutes away!
neighborhood_overview:
Exarchia is a neighborhood that has a special place in the heart of Athenians. They do not have a touristic element, they are not ephemeral and they are not about fashion. All the dynamics of the city come out here. They have their own story and a creative inner life that is perfect for artists of all kinds!
You will find Exarchia in their artistic cafes, in their quaint taverns, in the sunlight that illuminates street art works on the walls of their alleys, on their pedestrian paths and stairs, in their theaters and bookshops, in the stories of their buildings.
This neighborhood has an edgy alternative vibe, it is full of bookshops and stores selling rare vinyl and vintage guitars. Bars and clubs host live music, including rembetika (Greek blues), jazz and punk acts. Shady Valtetsiou street has a village feel, with low-key Mediterranean and veggie-friendly eateries alongside cozy tavernas.
Exarchia is over all an authentic, bohemian neighborhood that you should definite

neighborhood_overview:
Area Description:
Close to Thiseio and the Acropolis but safely removed from their tourist traps, Petralona blends old-school charm, artistic vibes and boho haunts. Like many parts of the downtown, this too, seems kind of disorganized and chaotic, with a haphazard mix of different architectural styles and lots of graffiti. But then again this is where its allure lays – in true Athenian style.

Amid the whole scruffy setting there are alternative-chic joints – from traditional taverns with a twist, to experimental places featuring theater and gigs, Thai and French restaurants and trend-setting bars. Launched by a swarm of young creatives who’ve recently relocated in the area, these eye-catching spots are responsible for the area’s renaissance - Petralona is often dubbed the “New Gazi”. It still retains though a distinctly local character and feel, without being over-commercialized or pretentious like its fabled neighbor.

Petralona is also conveniently positio
host_about:
Welcome to MyGreekVacations! We're thrilled to have you join us in one of our unique, beautifully-designed apartments here in Athens. As passionate travelers ourselves, we know that the perfect nocarz rental is more than just a place to stay – it's an experience that you'll remember for a lifetime. 
Whether you're here for business or leisure, we're always available to provide assistance to make your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible.

name: Venia's quiet vintage apartment in Athens
description: Relax with your family, friends, loved ones, co-workers or alone, in a quiet neighborhood, 350 meters away from the train station, with a supermarket, pharmacy, cafes and bakery in the same square. neighborhood_overview:
Kato Patisia is one of the most densely populated areas of Athens. Their main road axis is Acharnon and they are served by two electric stops, Agios Nikolaos and Kato Patisia.
Surprisingly, it's not the station of the same name that gets you into their hearts. On the contrary, if one goes down to Agios Nikolaos and starts his walk from Papanastasiou Street, he will see some of the most vivid images of the area.
On Acharnon Street, the neighborhood atmosphere gives way to a colorful noise. The natural border of Kato Patisia is never quiet and it seems that the sunny afternoons suit her very well.

Like many parts of the downtown, this too, seems kind of disorganized and chaotic, with a haphazard mix of different architectural styles and lots of graffiti. But then again this is where its allure lays – in true Athenian style.

Amid the whole scruffy setting there are alternative-chic joints – from traditional taverns with a twist, to experimental places featuring theater and gigs, Thai and French restaurants and trend-setting bars. Launched by a swarm of young creatives who’ve recently relocated in the area, these eye-catching spots are responsible for the area’s renaissance - Petralona is often dubbed the “New Gazi”. It still retains though a distinctly local character and feel, without being over-commercialized or pretentious like its fabled neighbor. Petralona is also conveniently positioned for exploring the city on foot.
host_about:
Welcome to MyGreekVacations! We're thrilled to have you join us in one of our unique, beautifully-designed apartments here in Athens. As passionate travelers ourselves, we know that the perfect nocarz rental is more than just a place to stay – it's an experience that you'll remember for a lifetime. 
Whether you're here for business or leisure, we're always available to provide assistance to make your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible.
