neighborhood_overview:
Ambelolkipi is a typical Athenian residential neighbourhood in the off-centre. Bus connections to the historic centre and around the city are excellent. There are also some major hospitals in close proximity and a verdant park just around the corner. Supermarkets and various stores are also within walking distance.
 
Highlights
 
Acropolis, Acropolis Museum and Plaka 5,5 km
Syntagma Square 4,2 km
Piraeus port 15 km
Nearest bus station at 250 m, nearest metro at 550 m

name: 2 br cozy stylish apartment
description:
2 br cozy, stylish apt in a hip neighborhood, within walking distance to the historic sites. We have personally stayed in the apartment for 3 weeks to make sure everything that could be needed is available.
The apartment has a fully functional kitchen , cozy balcony, TV in all the rooms, automatic blinds and a comfortable sitting area.
You can walk to one of the cafes, have a cup of coffee then stroll down the park for a calm morning.
Hope you enjoy your stay.
neighborhood_overview:
2 br cozy, stylish apt in a hip neighborhood, within walking distance to the historic sites. We have personally stayed in the apartment for 3 weeks to make sure everything that could be needed is available.
The apartment has a fully functional kitchen (approved by a chef-my wife), cozy balcony, TV in all the rooms, automatic blinds and a comfortable sitting area. With a lot of restaurant, cafe and bar options in the neighborhood you won’t need to go far for a fun night out.
Most all of the places also deliver if you want to stay in. There are 3 grocery stores within a short walking distance, lot’s of pharmacies and even a pet store.
You can walk to one of the cafes, have a cup of coffee then stroll down the park for a calm morning.
Please do not hesitate to contact me for any recommendations; my wife and I would be happy to share some of our favorites.
Hope you enjoy your stay.

It is known for its impressive neoclassical buildings, luxury residences, sophisticated boutiques and sophisticated restaurants and cafes. The area also offers rich shopping possibilities, with many stores with international and domestic brands. In addition, the neighborhood of Kolonaki is known for its lively nightlife, with trendy bars and clubs offering unique entertainment experiences. In addition, the neighborhood has an excellent transport connection, as well as easy access to parks and recreational areas. Overall, Kolonaki is one of the most desirable and developed areas to live in Athens.

Nestled in the heart of Athens, 'Kosmos 31' is a newly renovated modern apartment situated in the picturesque and safest neighborhood of Neos Kosmos, right at the foot of the Acropolis temple. Centrally located in a tranquil, peaceful & secure environment in the area of Kynosargous, 5 minutes walk from Koukaki.

neighborhood_overview:
Neos Kosmos, located in Athens, is a vibrant neighborhood that offers a wealth of attractions, amenities, and culinary delights. Here, you'll find a blend of local charm and modern conveniences, creating a lively and diverse atmosphere.

Neos Kosmos is home to various local attractions that showcase the rich history and culture of Athens. The impressive Stavros Niarchos Foundation Cultural Center is a must-visit, hosting exhibitions, performances, and beautiful landscaped gardens. The Acropolis Museum is also within reach, providing an immersive experience into ancient Greek art and history. Additionally, it is noteworthy to mention the presence of a sizable park, conveniently situated within a five-minute walking distance, known as Kinosargous.

name: 2nd Floor Studio-Goldfish
description: Welcome to your sunlit sanctuary in the heart of Athens, nestled in a central neighborhood with Athenian neoclassical beauties. Step into this cozy studio apartment and let the warmth of natural sunlight embrace you. This charming abode is not just a home; it's a mood fixer, designed for shiny, happy people like you who are always chasing the sunshine. host_about:
A very warm welcome from me, Theoharis, the owner of Vilaman ΙΚΕ, the property management company that is running this property.
Having traveled extensively in the Americas, SE Asia and Europe, and being a demanding traveller myself, I adapted my experiences to my native Greece and combined them with our philoxenia: the ancient greek word that literally means a “friend to a stranger” and is synonymous to hospitality. 
For Greeks however, it is something deeper than that., it is an unspoken cultural law that shows generosity and courtesy to strangers. 
In addition, my personal relationship with each property owner allows me to make sure that everything runs smoothly, as desired, so that our every guest feels at home at our properties and takes a unique experience and unforgettable memories back home with them.

name: Aionion Residences by K&K - Evnoe Residence
description:
Evnoe Residence is an apartment on the first floor of the building, its facing Vassilis street and overlooking the patio. There is one bedroom with a double bed, a bathroom (with shower) and a living area with a sofa that can be set as a double bed, a dining table and a kitchenette.
We welcome you to unwind in this unique home after a day of exploration in Athens.
neighborhood_overview:
The building lies in Vassilis street. Vassili was a nymph of the earth in Greek mythology whowas worshipped in Ilissos river. Twelve apartments received their names from mythical nymphs, except for the Apollo Luxury Residence. The Greek god of light had fallen in love with the nymph Daphne and we named the two interjoined rooms after them.
The area is a perfect blend of two worlds.
One side is a quiet authentic neighborhood with traditional little stores that will make you feel you live like a local.
The other side is steps away from the famous Apostolou Pavlou pedestrian street, the most beautiful street to walk in the whole city.
It is said that all the history of Athens lies at the sides of this road, which takes you to the Acropolis in just a 10 minute walk.

Koukaki  is very close to the Acropolis, the Syngrou Fix Museum of Modern Art , the Acropolis Museum and the picturesque pedestrianized districts of Plaka, Monastiraki and Thision, as well as to  Syntagma Square - the city centre.

name: Aionion Residences by K&K-Vassili Luxury Residence
description:
Vassili Deluxe Residence is an apartment on the first floor of the building. It actually is two joined apartments: each of them has one bedroom with a double bed, a bathroom with a shower, a living room with a sofa that can be set as a double bed, a kitchenette, a dining area and a balcony.
We welcome you to unwind in this unique home after a day of exploration in Athens.
neighborhood_overview:
The building lies in Vassilis street. Vassili was a nymph of the earth in Greek mythology whowas worshipped in Ilissos river. Twelve apartments received their names from mythical nymphs, except for the Apollo Luxury Residence. The Greek god of light had fallen in love with the nymph Daphne and we named the two interjoined rooms after them.
The area is a perfect blend of two worlds.
One side is a quiet authentic neighborhood with traditional little stores that will make you feel you live like a local.
The other side is steps away from the famous Apostolou Pavlou pedestrian street, the most beautiful street to walk in the whole city.
It is said that all the history of Athens lies at the sides of this road, which takes you to the Acropolis in just a 10 minute walk.

neighborhood_overview:
Pagrati is a district of the eastern part of the Municipality of Athens, which extends east of Vasilissis Sofias Avenue, a short distance from the historic centre of Athens. The main attraction of the Pangrati area is the Panathinaiko Stadium. The National Gallery, the Goulandris Foundation Museum of Contemporary Art and the National Research Foundation are located in the wider area of the district, while the Athens Conservatory, the Byzantine Museum, the Officer's Club and the War Museum are a
short distance away.

Pangrati was developed with its centre at the Eftihidou Street, where its residents and other Athenians used to hang out, and Ymittou Street, where mainly residents of the surrounding refugee districts of Byron and Kaisariani used to hang out. Pagrati thus became the centre of the south-eastern areas of Athens, which met the needs of the residents of the surrounding areas for shopping, entertainment and services. name: Modern and Stylish Apartment in Kolonaki
description: A stylish and modern apartment in the heart of the vibrant and upscale  Kolonaki neighbourhood - the ideal location in order to experience the diverse and fascinating city of Athens!
neighborhood_overview: Kolonaki is one of the nicest and most vibrant neighbourhoods of Athens. Its location is ideal for exploring Athens, either on foot or by Metro. Fashion boutiques, restaurants, cafes, bars, museums, the National Gallery of Art, the National Park, the Presidential Residence (ex Royal Palace), the Parliament, and the Panathenaic Stadium are all in close proximity to the apartment.
host_about:
I am from Athens, however I have very close ties with two beautiful Greek islands Santorini and Patmos.

As my father’s family is from Santorini I spent all my summers there. Since I am a licensed tour guide, in 2004 I decided to move to Santorini in order to work there. This was a great chance to start renovating my family’s properties in order to be able to share them with people from all over the world. 

In addition, many years ago, my mother visited the island of Patmos, fell in love with it and decided to buy two beautiful pieces of land, including very old farmhouses in ruinous condition, that she slowly renovated. In this way, our family and numerous friends enjoyed many unforgettable Patmos Easters and summers. Nowadays, I am responsible for the good condition of the houses that I rent out and share the beauty and special ambiance of this island with our guests.

I am very lucky since my twin daughters, Alexandra and Christina, having completed their studies abroad in hospitality management and tourism, returned to their roots in order to continue and develop what I started.  Genuine hospitality, love and respect for the island, as well as the embracement of the local culture define our core values. Nowadays we all share our time between Santorini, Patmos and Athens, and have the honor and pleasure to share our family’s story and our love for these islands, with visitors from all over the world. 

After many years in the hospitality industry, today I have the pleasure along with my daughters to embrace one more much loved island home, my husband's summer house on the island of Hydra. The house was built by my father in law 40 years ago. My husband Dimitris will be managing the house in Hydra.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in one of the most central and busy areas of Athens close to museums, archaeological sites, embassies, hospitals (Laiko 550m, Children-Agia Sophia-P. & A. In the immediate area of the house there are several shops that serve your everyday life like: supermarket, grocery store, butcher, pharmacy, gym, bakery, patisserie and private parking. Also there are several recreation-entertainment options near by such as restaurants, cafes, bars, theaters, cinemas e.t.c.
The area is served by public transportation such as buses that can take you to many Athens regions and in the center. The metro station "Megaron Mousikis" (blue line) is just a 5 minute walk from the apartment and 2 stops (about 2 minutes) to reach Athens center (Syntagma station). It is also a direct line to the airport.

neighborhood_overview:
Syntagma, located at the heart of Athens, is a bustling neighborhood brimming with history and modern conveniences, making it an essential destination for any visitor to the city. "Voulis" refers to Voulis Street, which runs parallel to the iconic Ermou Street, known for its vibrant shopping scene.

Voulis Street itself exudes a more laid-back charm compared to its bustling neighbor. It's lined with neoclassical buildings, small boutiques, quaint cafes, and traditional Greek tavernas. These eateries serve delectable local cuisine that offers a genuine taste of Greece—think succulent olives, creamy tzatziki, and freshly baked pita.

Just a stone's throw away is Syntagma Square, the central square of Athens, dominated by the grand Hellenic Parliament building. Here, you can witness the ceremonial changing of the guard, an event that captures the pride and cultural heritage of Greece.

Beyond the square, you can stroll through the National Gardens, an oasis o

neighborhood_overview:
This stunning penthouse is located in a prime area, offering easy access to some of Athens' most iconic landmarks, vibrant squares, and charming cafés. Just a short walk away, you’ll find Plato Academy Square (250 m), Petroula Square (600 m), and Ramnes Square (750 m), providing lovely spots to explore the local neighborhood. Further afield, Pantazopoulou Square (1 km) and Omonia Square (2 km) are easily reachable for more sightseeing.

Cultural enthusiasts will appreciate the proximity to the Islamic Art Museum (1.7 km) and the Benaki Museum – Pireos 138 (2 km). For those looking to dive into Athens’ rich history, you’ll find the Ancient Agora (2.3 km), Monastiraki Square (2.4 km), and the Temple of Hephaestus (2.5 km) within a short distance, along with the National Archaeological Museum of Athens (2.6 km), the Roman Agora (2.6 km), and the Acropolis (3.3 km).

neighborhood_overview: Pangrati, or Pagkrati, is a lively residential neighborhood in central Athens, Greece. It's known for its blend of traditional charm and modern amenities, making it a popular area among locals and expats alike. Pangrati is also notable for its proximity to major Athenian landmarks, such as the Panathenaic Stadium, where the first modern Olympics were held in 1896.

name: Acropolis Signature Apartment
description: All travelers will have easy access to everything they need at this centrally-located place to stay.
host_about:
Born and raised in Athens; two different generations, mother and daughter, sharing the same admire for our beautiful city and the same passion for travelling and dancing.

Anny  is a Marketing and Communication graduate and a Tourism Management postgraduate that has been working for the past five years in a travel agency in the centre of Athens.  

Emilia is a lifetime entrepreneur from her early years dedicated to different fields of expertise.

We are dedicated to provide our guests with the essence of the Authentic Greek Hospitality. We are looking forward to welcome you in our amazing historical city, a city of ancient history, breathtaking views, scenic alleys, picturesque neighborhoods, romantic sunsets, Mediterranean beaches, traditional food, art, nightlife, sunny days and warm hearts.

One of my dreams is to travel throughout the world, meet different cultures and keep filling my album of life with unique pictures of different places. However, while people are the ones that give life to the beauty of a country, I am really pleased to become a part of your Greek experience and assist you to fill your own album of life with pictures of my fascinating city. It would be an honor to assist you in anything you may need during your stay in Athens and provide you with every information you may require.

We are really happy to welcome you to our city, to make you feel like home and to share with you our passion for exploration and travelling and our love for the historical, vibrant, sunny and diverse city of Athens.

name: Sunny Lycabettus Renovated Apt
description: Enjoy a spacious, newly renovated apartment offering full comfort in the heart of Athens, Neapoli Exarchia. Featuring a king-size bed, 2 AC units, and a smart TV, this tranquil home is situated at the corner of a pedestrian street and a small park. Experience authentic Greek living with 2 coffee shops and the renowned Miss Neapoli restaurant right at the corner, plus a convenient store just 10 meters from the entrance. Direct bus lines provide easy access to the historic center.
neighborhood_overview: Neapoli Exarchia, nestled in the vibrant heart of Athens, pulses with a unique energy. Known for its bohemian atmosphere and eclectic mix of cultures, this area is a haven for artists, intellectuals, and free spirits. Wander through its labyrinthine streets adorned with colorful street art, bustling cafes, and cozy tavernas. Embrace the rebellious spirit of Exarchia Square, where history meets modern activism. From alternative music venues to cozy bookshops, Neapoli Exarchia offers an authentic Athenian experience that ignites the soul and sparks the imagination.

name: Jenny’s home Acropolis  penthouse next to museum
description: Welcome to Tzeni’s house,your perfect Athens getaway located in the heart of the vibrant Acropolis area just 100m from the iconic Acropolis museum.Immerse yourself in the rich history and culture of Athens while enjoying the comforts of our recently renovated apartment.
neighborhood_overview: The residence is just a stone's throw from all major historical sites. The metro station and the Acropolis bus stop are located 150 meters away from the apartment. The historic Acropolis monument is 300 meters away and the New Acropolis Museum is 100 meters away, as well as the Herodion Odeon and the ancient Theatre of Dionysus. Next to the apartment are the Ancient Agora, the Temple of Zeus and other historical and cultural monuments. All shops such as baker, supermarket, grocery store and florist are within walking distance. Just a few meters away from the property are other major attractions, such as Syntagma Square, Plaka, Monastiraki Market, as well as the shopping centers of the city.

neighborhood_overview:
Syntagma, located at the very heart of Athens, is a neighborhood that beautifully encapsulates the essence of the city, blending historical significance with modern vibrancy. Here’s an overall look at what makes Syntagma a prime destination for visitors.

Ermou Street, starting at Syntagma Square, is a shopper’s paradise with a mix of luxury boutiques and popular retail chains. The area is also known for its diverse dining options, from traditional Greek tavernas to chic international restaurants and cafes.

The National Garden, adjacent to the square, provides a lush retreat with walking paths and serene spots. The nearby Zappeion Hall and garden offer additional green spaces and host cultural events.

Syntagma is the perfect base in Athens, offering rich history, cultural attractions, excellent shopping and dining, beautiful parks, and a lively nightlife. Its central location and vibrant atmosphere make it ideal for both short visits and extended stays

name: Your best choice in Athens
description: A bright apartment , fully equipped with everything you need to enjoy your stay in Athens carefree. Perfect for couples and explorers. neighborhood_overview:
Caring an intriguing history the area of "Metaxourgion" is considering to be , perhaps , one of the oldest
squares in the history of Athens. A neighborhood completes it self within the artistic aurora which can be
seen and felt in every street corner. Alternative cafeterias , small restaurants and tavernas , theaters ,
architecture and artistic events await you . A great location for exploring city life and blend in like a local.
Getting to know the neighborhood better , we do highly recommend to explore it.

A list with small mini convenient stores for you to begin with.
-Mini Market at street "Theodorou Diligianni 30" within 3 minutes walk (240m) stays open until 11:30 pm.
-Supermarket at street "Chiou 48-50" within 3 minutes walk is another convenient store stays open until 9:00 pm.
However don't miss out exploring the Athenian Market. You can find all kinds of goodies, fruits and vegetables , meat and fish which you could have a taste

description: Welcome to Acropolis Muses Luxury Apartment Retreat, an exclusive collection of luxury apartments in the heart of Athens, inspired by the 9 ancient Greek Muses.
neighborhood_overview: Nestled on Kalamiotou Street in the vibrant Monastiraki district, Acropolis Muses Luxury Apartment Retreat offers an unparalleled location for your Athens stay. This historic pedestrian street is a lively hub of culture and activity, lined with charming shops, traditional restaurants, and trendy bars. Just a short stroll from Monastiraki Square and its famous flea market, the area provides a perfect blend of ancient history and modern vibrancy. Another highlight of the neighborhood, is the renowned Plaka and its narrow alleys filled with little shops and scenic corners, located at the slopes of the Acropolis. The proximity to the Monastiraki metro station ensures easy access to all corners of the city, making it an ideal base for exploring the treasures of Athens.

name: Historic Stone-house in Kerameikos
description: With private entrance from a pedestrian alley, this 1917 stone building is the home of an architect that renovated the space with respect to the original materials and aesthetic feel. While she travels for research, she offers her space to other travellers. The location is super-central but our alley is purely residential, without traffic noise or bars. Still, the gastronomy and street-food scene of Keramikos is a couple of minutes away!
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located just a ten minute walk from the historical center of Athens. The Keramikos neighborhood is a neighborhood that combines tradition but at the same time intense young life with countless picturesque cafes restaurants and clubs, it seems to exist and operate in its own magical world. This is the neighborhood of the capital where the old, the ancient and the new coexist in perfect harmony. Around the apartment you can find small restaurants and cafes, supermarket, bakery, pharmacy ... etc.

name: Minimalist and Comfortable 1BR Suite in Athens
description: Welcome to the heart of Athens! Our hotel, located in the central area of the city, offers facilities suitable for people with limited mobility, ensuring comfort and accessibility for all our guests. The suite is designed with excellent lighting to create a cozy and relaxing atmosphere. It is also equipped with a safe to store your valuables and offers free internet connection to keep you connected during your stay.
neighborhood_overview:
The hotel is close to enigmatic sites and architectural miracles, with splendid views of historical sites such as the city itself.

- The Erechtheion is one of the most distinctive temples of the Acropolis due to its unique architecture and its location on a rocky slope. It is notable for its six Ionic-style columns in the south portico, known as the Caryatids, which depict young women and are sculpted in marble.
In addition to the Caryatids, the Erechtheion features a number of sculpted reliefs depicting Greek mythology, as well as architectural elements such as friezes and decorated pediments. The temple stands in a prominent position on the Acropolis and offers breathtaking views of the city of Athens and its surroundings.

neighborhood_overview: Pagrati is a trendy, artsy neighborhood in Athens, known for its bohemian vibe and creative spirit. Just a short walk from the city center, it’s a hub of stylish cafes, galleries, and intimate bars that attract locals and visitors alike. name: Luxurious Zen Retreat W/Balcony & 300mbps WiFi
description: Welcome to our stunning 70m2 sanctuary, nestled in a charming post-war corner building, where luxury and comfort blend seamlessly to offer you an unforgettable stay. Awash with natural light, this exquisite apartment boasts high ceilings and an elegant entry, complete with a desk setup and full length mirror. Two bedrooms and one bathrooms. Lightning fast wifi with and free Netflix makes it the ideal starting point to discover Athens!
neighborhood_overview:
One of the least touristic yet beautiful areas of Athens with many things to offer. Pagrati/Mets are full of hip bars & cafés from high-end Michelin star dining (Spondi) to more casual joints (Fish Point) with its half-fish market/half-sushi offerings.

Just a 10 minutes from Alsos Park, you can find a perfect afternoon walk in the wooded pine tree grounds. This area is situated just behind the Panathenaic stadium and at the far end, it meets the First Cemetery of Athens. Go there for a peaceful round and visit many 19th-century graves.

At the center is Varnava square, a bustling circle with many cafes and hip corner bars. Traditional food, meze (small plate) dinner options, and late-night crawls can all be found. This is an exciting area with the new Goulandris Museum of Modern Art just 10 minutes away by foot.

Discover Acropolis views from unexpected hilly locales. The Pagrati neighborhood is a 10-minute walk to the National Gardens and a 15-minute wa

description:
24hr SELF CHECKIN! Whole apartment! Aircondition in all rooms & living-room. Renting our apartment is considered the "smart choice" for Athens visitors. Because we are a short walk or a couple of metro stops from most touristy places, while at the same time our guests pay a much lower price for their stay than in the touristy area.

We are located in a central and historic neighborhood, 5min walk from metro.

Fully equipped: open plan kitchen, walk-in shower, 2 balconies, 1 Queen bed+2 double
neighborhood_overview:
OUR NEIGHBORHOOD
The apartment is located in a safe, historic and multicultural neighborhood in the CENTER OF ATHENS!!!
Renting an apartment in our neighborhood is considered the "smart choice" because its only 2 stops away from the touristy area while at the same time paying a at a much lower booking price per night. The surrounding area is certainly not a conventional touristy one, but if you're looking for something different, you'll love this authentic, multicultural and bohemian area. OUR GUESTS LOVE OUR NEIGHBORHOOD because a) is very central as you can see on our map b) its very safe 24hrs, as you can read on our reviews, and c) as you can note, its very reasonably priced. Its next to excellent transport links if you want to discover Athens further. OUR GUESTS DONT LOVE OUR NEIGHBORHOOD because its "picture-perfect" and we dont advertise it as such!

name: Cosy Penthouse in Exarchia with Private Balcony
description: Ideal for vacationers and digital nomads, this stylish 1-bedroom apartment in the best part of Exarcheia sports a big terrace and modern amenities, like a fully equipped kitchen, high-speed WiFi, Flat TV, and A/C. In the heart of the city, it provides a comfortable stay with easy access to Lycabettus Hill, posh Kolonaki and vibrant Neapolis, offering a peaceful retreat in Athens.
neighborhood_overview:
This is a wonderful part of downtown Athens, blending proximity to some of the world's most important landmarks with great options for dining or meeting with business partners and friends. Everything you need, from supermarkets, bakeries and grocery stores to bustling cafes and bars, modern eateries, fancy restaurants and chic shopping, is within fast and easy walking distance. Plus, bus and metro connections are excellent, if you want to venture beyond the city center – every corner of which is accessible by foot when you feel like taking a stroll.

Highlights

Kolonaki Square – the beating heart of Athens’ most prestigious neighborhood – is some 10 minutes walk away and so are the area’s high-end boutiques and stores, art galleries, museums, bustling bars and chic restaurants. name: Chateau Lykabettus
description: Penthouse with panoramic Views in the center of Athens - super fast internet by Elon Musk's satellite dish -Star Link ideal for Remote Work and Central Location. A penthouse located on the top floor of a stunning building in the center of Athens. The property is next to a park with towering trees and lush greenery, giving you the feeling of being in nature rather than the bustling city center. Enjoy the fresh air and tranquility while just moments away from the Acropolis and Syntagma Square.
neighborhood_overview:
Lycabettus Hill and the surrounding neighborhood where Chateau Lykabettus is located offer one of the most prestigious and scenic experiences in Athens. Here's an overview of this area:

### **Lycabettus Hill**
Lycabettus Hill (Mount Lycabettus) is a prominent landmark in Athens, rising 300 meters (about 980 feet) above sea level, making it the highest point in the city. The hill is covered in pine trees, offering a lush green contrast to the urban landscape. At the summit, you'll find the charming St. George's Chapel, a small whitewashed church that dates back to the 19th century. The top of Lycabettus Hill provides breathtaking panoramic views of Athens, the Aegean Sea, and the surrounding mountains, making it a popular spot for both locals and tourists.

To reach the summit, you can hike up one of the several trails that wind around the hill or take a funicular railway that runs from the base near Kolonaki. The hike is moderate in difficulty and well worth t
host_about:
Hey there, fellow adventurers!  I'm thrilled to have you here in the heart of Greece, where the views are as epic as the legends, and the hospitality is warmer than our summer sun! I

! I speak Arabic, Greek, and English, so we can swap tales in whichever language suits you best. 

So, whether you're a history buff, a foodie, or just here to relax, Château Lykabettus is your perfect home away from home.

description:
This apartment offers direct access to Athens' main transportation routes. With just a 2-minute walk, you can reach Petralona train station, from where you can easily reach Monastiraki or the port of Piraeus in 15-20 minutes.

Enjoy a pleasant stroll with a 15-minute walk to Thissio or 20-minute walk to the Acropolis. Within 5 minutes, you will find restaurants, cafes, and bars, while the neighborhood offers all necessary amenities such as supermarkets, banks, pharmacies, and more.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in the charming and traditional neighborhood of Ano Petralona, part of Athens' historic center. This area beautifully blends the nostalgic charm of old Athens with the vibrancy of modern urban life.

Within close proximity, you’ll find a wide variety of restaurants, cafes, shops, including supermarkets ,pharmacies, banks and an open-air cinema. The area is a favorite among locals for its excellent dining options, offering many delightful choices for the discerning traveler.

Petralona is one of the most picturesque neighborhoods in the city, evoking the charm of old Athens. With its retro and nostalgic atmosphere, you can enjoy delicious meze and flavorful dishes of Greek cuisine at venues with outdoor seating. Traditional tavernas, modern eateries, and meze restaurants invite you to a delightful and memorable culinary experience.

neighborhood_overview:
Exarchia is one of Athens' most vibrant and eclectic neighborhoods, known for its rich cultural history, bohemian atmosphere, and strong sense of community. Situated just north of the city center and conveniently located near the National Archaeological Museum, Exarchia is a melting pot of artistic expression, political activism, and youthful energy.
Offers a unique blend of history, culture, and contemporary life, making it a must-visit destination for anyone looking to experience the authentic and alternative side of Athens. Whether you're exploring its artistic streets, enjoying a coffee in one of its bustling squares, or delving into its rich history, Exarchia promises an unforgettable experience.
host_about:

neighborhood_overview:
The area:

Petralona, situated in the heart of Athens, is a neighborhood that seamlessly blends old-world charm with contemporary vibrancy. Known for its traditional houses, cobblestone streets, and lively atmosphere, Petralona offers visitors an authentic Athenian experience. This area is particularly favored by locals and tourists alike for its cultural richness, diverse culinary scene, and proximity to many of Athens’ iconic landmarks.

One of the key highlights of Petralona is its vibrant dining and nightlife scene. The neighborhood is dotted with a variety of tavernas, cafes, and bars that cater to all tastes. From traditional Greek dishes to modern fusion cuisine, the eateries in Petralona offer a culinary journey through Greece’s rich gastronomic heritage. In the evenings, the area comes alive with locals and visitors enjoying live music, good food, and the warm Athenian hospitality.

Cultural enthusiasts will find plenty to explore in Petralona. Th

neighborhood_overview: Ampelokipi is a vibrant and bustling neighborhood located in the heart of Athens, known for its lively atmosphere and convenient location. This area offers a blend of residential and commercial spaces, making it a dynamic place to stay.Well-connected by public transport, including the Ampelokipi metro station, it offers easy access to major city attractions like Syntagma Square and the Acropolis. Ampelokipi also features a variety of shopping options, from local boutiques to larger stores, and all necessary amenities such as supermarkets and pharmacies. With several parks and green spaces nearby, it's a great place to relax and enjoy outdoor activities. This neighborhood combines local charm with urban conveniences, making it an ideal base for exploring Athens.

neighborhood_overview:
Pagrati is a vibrant and eclectic neighborhood in the heart of Athens, offering a unique blend of urban convenience and local charm. Known for its lively atmosphere, Pagrati is home to a diverse array of cafes, restaurants, and boutique shops, creating a bustling yet laid-back vibe.

The area is rich in history and culture, with nearby attractions such as the Panathenaic Stadium and the National Garden of Athens providing ample opportunities for exploration. Pagrati also boasts excellent public transportation links, making it easy to access other parts of the city. Whether you're strolling through its lively streets, enjoying a coffee at a local café, or discovering nearby historical sites, Pagrati offers a quintessential Athenian experience.

neighborhood_overview:
Syntagma Square is the heart of Athens and a must-visit for any tourist. Here’s what you can do:

- Changing of the Guard: Watch the Evzones at the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier in front of the Greek Parliament. The full ceremony is every Sunday at 11 a.m.

- National Garden: Relax in this peaceful oasis just behind the Parliament.

- Shopping: Walk down Ermou Street for shopping, or explore local boutiques and cafes. Café Zonars is a must-visit for a historic coffee experience.

- Nearby Museums: Visit the Benaki Museum and the Museum of Cycladic Art, both just a short walk away.

- Free Events: Syntagma often hosts free concerts and events—perfect for spontaneous fun.

- Explore More: Walk to nearby neighborhoods like Monastiraki for its flea market or Plaka for its old-world charm.

- Rooftop Views: End your day with a drink at a rooftop bar like Electra Metropolis for stunning views of the Acropolis.

Exploring Psirri, Athens: A Vibrant Neighborhood for Tourists

Psirri, located in the heart of Athens, is a lively and eclectic neighborhood known for its vibrant atmosphere, street art, and a mix of traditional and modern influences. Here’s a guide to help you make the most of your visit:

Overview
Psirri is a bustling area filled with narrow streets and alleys, lined with neoclassical buildings and adorned with colorful street art. It’s a popular destination for both locals and tourists, offering a unique blend of old-world charm and contemporary culture. The area comes alive in the evening, making it a perfect spot for nightlife enthusiasts.

neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood

Nestled in the heart of Athens, this apartment is ideally located for travelers eager to explore both the rich history and vibrant culture of the city. Just a 2-minute walk from the National Archaeological Museum, a must-see for lovers of ancient Greek artifacts, you’ll be at the doorstep of one of Athens’ most significant cultural institutions. The neighborhood is bustling yet charming, with a variety of local shops, cafes, and restaurants offering authentic Greek cuisine just a stroll away.

Conveniently close to public transport, a 5-minute walk will take you to the nearest metro station, giving you easy access to all major attractions, including the Acropolis, Plaka, and Syntagma Square. Enjoy the energetic urban vibe with an array of cultural spots, theatres, and small art galleries nearby. If you're a foodie, the area offers everything from traditional tavernas to trendy modern eateries.

host_about:
A very warm welcome from me, Theoharis, the owner of Vilaman ΙΚΕ, the property management company that is running this property.
Having traveled extensively in the Americas, SE Asia and Europe, and being a demanding traveller myself, I adapted my experiences to my native Greece and combined them with our philoxenia: the ancient greek word that literally means a “friend to a stranger” and is synonymous to hospitality. 
For Greeks however, it is something deeper than that., it is an unspoken cultural law that shows generosity and courtesy to strangers. 
In addition, my personal relationship with each property owner allows me to make sure that everything runs smoothly, as desired, so that our every guest feels at home at our properties and takes a unique experience and unforgettable memories back home with them.

name: Vibrant Retreat: Funky Style & Acropolis View!
description: Welcome to your stylish sanctuary in the heart of Athens, where comfort, design, and convenience blend seamlessly. This brand-new, 70m² renovated two-bedroom apartment, located on the third floor in the vibrant Kerameikos area, offers a unique stay surrounded by art, culture, and nightlife. Step into a space where a funky color palette instantly elevates your mood and where every detail has been thoughtfully curated to enhance your experience.
neighborhood_overview:
Kerameikos is the new 'Soho' of Athens, with most major historical sites located within a 25-minute walking radius. It is safe, urban, and lively, full of
unique shops, authentic tavernas, cafes, art galleries and so far remains un-touristic. Strolling through Ker

During the day many Greeks go about their day, but at night the many local bars, taverns, and hotspots fill up with mainly an artistic crowd from the surrounding areas. There is a supermarket and deli just 100 meters from the house, with fresh and organic fruits and vegetables, which also sell some hot meals to go! There is also a health food store nearby, street food, hip Michelin-star restaurants, and other hidden gems in this surging creative area. Around the house, there are plenty of free parking spots for your car as well as exits to the National freeways.
host_about: Ahoy there, traveler! Allow us to introduce ourselves - we are The Homis, Homer and Isabella, a fun-loving duo ready to show you the time of your life in Athens and beyond! We're the masterminds behind several top-notch listings in our stunning city and on some lush islands, and we're here to make sure your adventure is nothing short of epic. Whether you need insider tips on hidden gems or a little extra pampering, just give us a holler. We're all about going the extra mile to give you an unforgettable stay. So, what are you waiting for? Let's make some memories together! - The Homis

neighborhood_overview:
Situated on the prestigious Adrianou Street, right in the heart of Plaka, one of Athens’ most iconic and historic neighborhoods. The area is renowned for its charming neoclassical architecture, cobblestone streets, and its perfect blend of tradition and modernity. Adrianou Street is one of the most sought-after locations in Athens, lined with upscale boutiques, artisan shops, and some of the best restaurants the city has to offer. As you step outside the apartment, you're instantly immersed in the vibrant atmosphere of Thiseio, often referred to as the "Neighborhood of the Gods," due to its proximity to the Acropolis.

This location is perfect for food lovers, as it's just steps away from a wide array of high-end dining options and cozy tavernas offering authentic Greek cuisine. The area is bustling with life, featuring everything from casual coffee spots with views of ancient ruins to fine dining restaurants with a contemporary twist on traditional dishes.

name: The HostMaster Metropolis City Lights
description: Welcome to our brand new, modern 2-bedroom apartment in the heart of Pagrati! This sleek and stylish space offers two cozy bedrooms, a bright and spacious living room, and a fully equipped kitchen. Enjoy a relaxing evening on the comfortable sofa or unwind on the outdoor balcony. The apartment features minimalist décor, modern amenities, and is located close to local attractions, cafes, and shops. Perfect for a relaxing stay in Athens!
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the heart of one of Athens' most charming and lively neighborhoods. Pagrati is known for its unique blend of old-world charm and modern vibrancy, making it an ideal destination for travelers looking to experience the authentic Athenian lifestyle. The area offers a delightful shopping experience with a variety of boutique stores, local markets, and specialty shops, especially around Varnava Square. Food lovers will find an array of dining options, from traditional Greek tavernas like "Katsourbos" and "Magemenos Avlos" to trendy cafes and international cuisine spots. For nightlife, enjoy a cocktail at "Chelsea Hotel" or dance at "Flamingo." Transportation is convenient with several bus lines and the Evangelismos metro station nearby, providing quick access to Athens' major attractions. The Acropolis and Parthenon are just a 20-minute walk or a short metro ride away, and the Panathenaic Stadium is also close, offering a glimpse into the city's rich history. The

All our properties are selected carefully in order to offer you the best stay! From the moment you book to the moment you arrive at the apartment, we are helping you through all the processes so that your stay is hassle-free!

host_about:
A very warm welcome from me, Theoharis, the owner of Vilaman ΙΚΕ, the property management company that is running this property.
Having traveled extensively in the Americas, SE Asia and Europe, and being a demanding traveller myself, I adapted my experiences to my native Greece and combined them with our philoxenia: the ancient greek word that literally means a “friend to a stranger” and is synonymous to hospitality. 
For Greeks however, it is something deeper than that., it is an unspoken cultural law that shows generosity and courtesy to strangers. 
In addition, my personal relationship with each property owner allows me to make sure that everything runs smoothly, as desired, so that our every guest feels at home at our properties and takes a unique experience and unforgettable memories back home with them.

description: Stay in the heart of Athens' historic Mets neighborhood at the Classic Living 2 Bd Historic Mets Apt. Perfect for up to 4 guests, this charming apartment features two cozy bedrooms, a spacious living room, and a private balcony with city views. Experience comfort and convenience in this prime location.
neighborhood_overview:
Situated in the upscale neighborhood of Mets, this area is a vibrant and historically rich district that seamlessly blends old-world charm with modern urban living. Mets is known for its charming streets lined with neoclassical buildings, lively cafes, and trendy restaurants, making it a favorite among locals and visitors alike. A highlight of the area is the nearby Panathenaic Stadium, the world’s only stadium made entirely of marble and the site of the first modern Olympic Games. Just a short walk away, you’ll find the verdant National Garden and the Zappeion Hall, ideal for leisurely strolls or quiet moments amidst lush greenery. For art and culture enthusiasts, the Goulandris Museum of Modern Art is a must-visit, showcasing an impressive collection of contemporary works.

Mets is exceptionally well-connected by public transport, ensuring easy access to the rest of Athens. The Evangelismos metro station (Blue Line) is within walking distance, providing direct links to Synt

neighborhood_overview:
Koukaki is one of Athens’ most vibrant and charming neighborhoods, nestled at the foot of the Acropolis. Known for its authentic Athenian vibe, it combines a rich historical backdrop with a lively, modern energy.

Stroll through its picturesque streets lined with neoclassical houses, trendy cafes, and traditional tavernas offering delicious Greek cuisine. The neighborhood is a hub for art and culture, with galleries, boutique shops, and cultural spaces at every corner.

Koukaki's prime location makes it ideal for exploring Athens’ major attractions. The Acropolis, Acropolis Museum, and Filopappou Hill are just a short walk away, offering breathtaking views and a journey through ancient history.

description: A brand-new, luxurious apartment in the heart of Athens, just steps away from all major attractions. host_about:
Hello everybody! 

We are Luxenia Apartments  team, and we will be very excited to host you in our property! 
We love meeting new people and really enjoy being nocarz Hosts. As we are born and raised in Athens, we are able to give you information on what to do and where to go while in Athens. We will ensure you a great stay, sharing our love for the city with you.
Furthermore, the combination of the professionalism and the excellent personal guest service, will offer you a delightful, exciting and trouble free stay in our apartments.

In our apartments we provide you:
- Air conditioning apartments with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV channels .
- Clean sheets and fresh towels.
- Bath amenities: shampoo, conditioner, body wash, body milk, slippers and hair dryer.
- Fully equipped small kitchen with fridge, oven, kettle, coffee machine, hot plates, crockery, and kitchen towels. 
- Safety Box, Washing machine and dryer, Iron and ironing board. 
- Easy entry through lockbox allowing you to enter whenever you want.
- Live support when you need it. 

Your excellent stay is our commitment.

Hope to host you soon!

host_about: Welcome to Crucial Hospitality. Your Requirements are Crucial to Us. We undertake the complete management of all kinds of property/from a single apartment up to boutique hotels, ensuring its perfect functionality 24/7 and providing high-end tools, aiming to increase your revenue without spending even a moment of your life. Crucial Hospitality is a professional full-service Boutique Hotels, Villas and Apartments Management Company. The organization’s aim is to assist property owners in developing their investment value with a stable income, that will be upgraded, repositioned on the tourism market and will increase its commercial value. CRUCIAL is the sole management company that offers a wide range of personalized services that responds to all owners’ needs, providing its smart innovative and holistic model of apartments, villas and boutique hotels. Digital Marketing Department rebrands your property / hotel, include the online and offline advertising, using only the international high end tools. Operations department ensures the perfect operation of your property, analyzing and monitoring each hotel department (Reservations, Housekeeping) via our innovative holistic guest feature. Crucial Hospitality Booking Platform has created its own booking platform for exclusive properties in Greece. All interested owners are able to register and upload their property, provided that it is fully renovated and meets all the necessary standards for hosting guests where the unique brand Summer In Greece exists.
